description: Upgrade your Mixed Martial Arts game with the MMA Fighting Shorts from MRX. These stylish shorts are created from a 100% micro fabric for extreme flexibility, featuring 4-way stretch material in the crotch area, and an advance side split for an added range of movement, especially while kicking. The seams are sealed with 3-needle stitching that can withstand the most extreme amount of force. An improved loop and hook closure system has been incorporated into the shorts at the waist flap and fly, for a better fitting short that wont fall off when the fighting gets tough. These MMA Fighting Shorts are available in Mens sizes with high-quality screen printed logos on the front and backsides. Look the part your next fight, and gain an added advantage of flexibility in these MMA Fighting Shorts from MRX.

Ultra-tight Perfect fit on your body to allowing you to full range movements during exercises or training. Made in Europe. SPECIFICATIONS  Material: 100% polyester Sizes: Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, XX-Large, XXX-Large. Size restocking every week Good for sport training such as boxing, martial arts, croffit, fitness, fighting, Muay Thai. Sublimated print. Machine Washable. Do not use bleach. If you are passionate about sports that emphasize or require physical contact between players, you know how it is important to have the right training equipment that allows you to move properly and work muscles at the best.That is why we have created a special fight - boxing shorts that will amaze you through its design and quality. An original gift for someone who loves the sport as much as you do!

description: Read more Product Features  INTERLOCKING DRAWSTRING  allows the users to tighten the shorts and train with ease. SMALL INNER POCKET  Keep the mouthpiece safely within arms reach with the pocket in the shorts. Product Features  ELASTICATED WAISTBAND  Allows users with varying waists to wear the shorts comfortably, POLYESTER AND SPANDEX BLEND  Trainees remain comfortable while donning the RDX MMA Shorts due to the optimal blend of polyester and spandex. SIDE SLITS FOR BETTER MOBILITY  Side slits ensure that the wearer has freedom of mobility and the range of motion is not hindered. Use the RDX MMA Shorts to work like the thunder and leave with the champions belt.  WHAT YOU GET  MMA Shorts that allow a wide range of motion to the user while training or competing.  VALUE WE OFFER  Inner pocket design that lets you keep the mouthpiece close by for use if needed.  EXCEPTIONAL QUALITY AND LASTING SATISFACTION  The blend of polyester and spandex, along with industrial-grade stitching, ensures that the users get long-lasting satisfaction and utility out of these shorts. Durable       Ergonomics       Sturdy       Previous page The three words that symbolize the process of self-improvement; a mission everyone resonates with. We are here to become our best without the distinction of race, culture, or ability. Together, we achieve this, when yesterdays struggles become todays stepping stones. Since 1999, we source and process our handcrafted products with a global network. With low expense, our durable products are useful for Boxing, MMA, Muay Thai as well as weightlifting, bodybuilding or Yoga. Designed to help self-improvement with every punch, we become part of customers journey. Together with our esteemed consumers, we plan to move, improve and evolve Next page
features: 98% Polyester, 2%Spandex$$$Imported$$$Drawstring closure$$$RDX MMA Training shorts are built with 98% polyester and 2% Spandex fabric material which is very resilient and can withstand a decentamount of wear and tear. High-quality polyesterand spandex holds its shape well and doesn't shrink. It dries quickly with sweat managing properties for comfortable wear.$$$Our fighting shorts are secured in place with interlocking drawstring that are adjustable and allows you to find the best fit and total security. The closure system provides a comfortable feel and also keeps your shorts in the right position during Boxing, Kickboxing, and Muay Thai training sessions.$$$These grappling shorts are fortified with 3Ply polyester stitching along the seams that ensure these are fit to wear over and over without ripping. Industry's top T3 stitching techniques improve resilience and performance.$$$Our training shorts feature a small inner pocket at the right side to stow away mouth guard between sparring rounds. Additionally the fabric helps to control body temperature. The odor prevention material resists bad aroma.$$$These boxing shorts are prepared with side slits which promise free range of motion and give you more leg flexibility and mobility. Anatomical cuts permit you to extend your leg without being restricted from not having enough room in the thigh area for high kicks.

description: SIAMKICK is a Muay-Thai Brand located in Bangkok, Thailand. Our mission to spread the beauty of Muay-Thai globally. We send out our shorts to over 20 camps in Thailand. With 10 years of experience, and over 20 full-time workers, we are devoted to providing authentic and high-quality Muay-Thai shorts that are able to withstand years of use. Apart from Muay Thai shorts, we offer all kinds of Muay Thai/Boxing equipments like headguards, t-shirts, boxing gloves, hand wraps and much more. Giving back is a big part of our mission. At the end of each year, 20% of our total proceeds will be donated towards Muay-Thai camps in different provinces of Thailand. Read more         Our shorts are made to withstand all sorts of kicks and blows. The elastic waistband is made from 6 rows of stitching, providing a snug and secure fit. Made from 100% Satin silk, our shorts are light and airy, while giving you the support and flexibility you need at the same time. We currently offer our adult shorts in 4 sizes: M, L, XL, XXL. Please refer to the last image for the sizing guidelines for your selected variation. All models of SIAMKICK shorts are tried by Muay-Thai fighters in Thailand to examine whether if they are performance focused and suitable for Muay-Thai. Read more Discover SIAMKICK Products Made for adults, our classic shorts offer vibrant colors, traditional Thai-style patterns and an increased leg opening. Made for adults, the dragon symbolizes wisdom and strength. Learn the story of Muay-Thai through our embroidery patterns. Made for children, this model follows the designs of our Adults Classic, allowing for a matching look for you and your child. Made for children, this model is designed to be lighter and more simplistic than the classic model. Recommended for beginners. Our newest release. These shorts are of the highest quality and can be custom-made to your liking. Ships straight from Thailand.    We recommend you to hand-wash our shorts, using a mild detergent . Please and at all times. We genuinely hope you're happy with our product.

description: Classic Muay Thai Fight Shorts: If you are looking for that classic boxing style combined with the length and cut of Muay Thai short? This shorts has been made for you! Optimized for Muay Thai, kickboxing and boxing.Complies with all boxing and Muay Thai competition requirements (select colors). Colors include red, blue, white, black and forest camo. Sizes from S till XXL. Hardcore Training sport wear brand: Hardcore Training creates high performance athletic apparel and equipment for combat sports and functional fitness including MMA, BJJ, Muay Thai, Boxing, Kickboxing, Jiu Jitsu, Grappling, Wrestling and CrossFit training. Our products are designed, developed and tested for the highest level of athletic competition.

description: Upgrade your Mixed Martial Arts game with the Muay Thai Shorts from MRX. These stylish shorts are created from a micro-fabric for extreme flexibility, featuring 4-way stretch fabric in the crotch area, and an advance side split for an added range of movement, especially while kicking. The seams are sealed with 3-needle stitching that can withstand the most extreme amount of force. An improved loop and hook closure system has been incorporated into the shorts at the waist flap and fly, for a better fitting short that wont fall off when the fighting gets tough. These MMA Fighting Shorts are available in Mens sizes, different colored in a unique design , with high-quality screen printed logos on the front and backsides, and embroidered badge on the front belt. Look the part your next fight, and gain an added advantage of flexibility in these Muay Thai Shorts from MRX. MRX  Muay Thai Fight Shorts Read more Men Boxing Shorts MMA Mauy Thai Training Fitness Gym Cage Fight Kickboxing Trunks Clothing       New Professional Series - Design to Experience Ultra Light Weight Material for 4 Way Body Movement Excellent Mobility Provided Through Extra Stretch Soft Advanced Material.Traditional Designs and Colors New Light Weight Material Provides Easy and Fast Moisture Wicking and keeps Lower Body Cool and Stress Free Read more The Elastic Waistband Provides Back Support - The Enhanced stretchable Waistband Material Provides Ideal Fit and Comfort During Training Read more Built to Fight: These shorts are made for fighters looking for an extended range in their fighting abilities, without hindrance from the clothes they are wearing Read more  SIZE CHART  Read more

I just wear a shirt that’s a little longer to hide that area and it’s fine. The thighs aren’t too tight like other shorts either. reviews: [{'header': 'Great company, good shorts for a Nak Muay.', 'body': 'My height and weight are already included. I typically wear a 32" / Medium when it comes to most pants that accommodate western based sizing.My only other Muay Thai shorts I\'ve had prior to these are the TUFF brand. I compared the two size charts and the measurements were mostly similar. I wear an XL in TUFF so I assumed I\'d be XL with this one. That wasn\'t the case as the XL fit like baggy basketball shorts on me, so I returned for a Medium. Much better fitting and can still execute kicks during drills and sparring. Have only done two training sessions in them so far so I\'ll see how they hold up. But my a lot of my training partners seem to have the same shorts (just in different colours) and there\'s no complaints from them.Very satisfied, but I\'d definitely recommend the company to tweak the sizing chart. Other than that, I\'m very happy!UPDATE (04/08/22):The vendor messaged me personally saying they\'d re-look into the sizing chart, thanked me for feedback. Honestly one of the very rare times a vendor has gone out of their way to go above and beyond to ensure I was satisfied with both product and customer service. description: SIAMKICK is a Muay-Thai Brand located in Bangkok, Thailand. Our mission to spread the beauty of Muay-Thai globally. We send out our shorts to over 20 camps in Thailand. With 10 years of experience, and over 20 full-time workers, we are devoted to providing authentic and high-quality Muay-Thai shorts that are able to withstand years of use. Apart from Muay Thai shorts, we offer all kinds of Muay Thai/Boxing equipments like headguards, t-shirts, boxing gloves, hand wraps and much more. Giving back is a big part of our mission. At the end of each year, 20% of our total proceeds will be donated towards Muay-Thai camps in different provinces of Thailand. Read more         Our shorts are made to withstand all sorts of kicks and blows. The elastic waistband is made from 6 rows of stitching, providing a snug and secure fit. Made from 100% Satin silk, our shorts are light and airy, while giving you the support and flexibility you need at the same time. We currently offer our adult shorts in 4 sizes: M, L, XL, XXL. Please refer to the last image for the sizing guidelines for your selected variation. All models of SIAMKICK shorts are tried by Muay-Thai fighters in Thailand to examine whether if they are performance focused and suitable for Muay-Thai. Read more Discover SIAMKICK Products Made for adults, our classic shorts offer vibrant colors, traditional Thai-style patterns and an increased leg opening. Made for adults, the dragon symbolizes wisdom and strength. Learn the story of Muay-Thai through our embroidery patterns. Made for children, this model follows the designs of our Adults Classic, allowing for a matching look for you and your child. Made for children, this model is designed to be lighter and more simplistic than the classic model. Recommended for beginners. Our newest release. These shorts are of the highest quality and can be custom-made to your liking. Ships straight from Thailand.    We recommend you to hand-wash our shorts, using a mild detergent . Please and at all times. We genuinely hope you're happy with our product.

Will a tradition boxing cup fit under these shorts?', 'answer': '     Thanks for the note and interest in our Classic Muay Thai Shorts! If your waist measurement is at bottom end of the sizing for a particular size you should be fine to stay in that size. If your waist measurement is towards the top end you will likely need to go to the next size up. If you have the boxing cup on hand you could always measure your waist with the cup on and order the corresponding size. Train hard, Team Anthem see less', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Anthem Athletics', 'date_answered': '2019-06-18'}, {'body': 'What is the leg opening measurement?', 'answer': '     Thank you for the message and interest in our Classic Muay Thai Shorts! The flat measurement of the leg opening ranges from 13.5" to 15.5" depending on the size. The "side slit" of the shorts is 3" for all sizes. Thanks again and please feel free to message us directly with any additional questions! Train hard, Team Anthem see less', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Anthem Athletics', 'date_answered': '2020-06-13'}, {'body': 'Is the small small enough for a child', 'answer': '     Thanks for the message and interest in our Classic Muay Thai Shorts! That\'s a bit tough to answer without knowing some additional sizing information about your child. The waist is designed to fit a 26-29" waist which typically equates to Youth Large or XL depending on the brand. However, depending on how big your child is, items like the leg opening might be and look a bit large for a child. Finally, we do offer two youth products - our Classic Boxing Trunks (almost identical to the Classic Muay Thai Shorts, but longer) and our Ascension Wrestling Shorts. Thanks again, and feel free to message us directly to discuss additional sizing details about your child or any other questions! Train hard, Team Anthem see less', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'Anthem Athletics', 'date_answered': '2019-07-19'}]
reviews: [{'header': 'Your High Kicks Will Thank You', 'body': "I wanted to upgrade from the athletic apparel selection at my local 'Walled Mart' so I looked at MMA shorts before deciding the best choice might be the Thai-style short the Muy Thai fighters wear. And yes, they provide the best range of motion of anything I've worn. They are comfortable and really seem to invite movement. They don't gather or bind when kicking or kneeing high. The sizing seems small so I recommend ordering one size up plus that will really help with their loose fit throughout the seat. Of course during a high kick, these shorts may 'raise the curtain' a bit too much for some audiences. Just focus on technique or wear compression shorts underneath. I say enjoy the ventilation. Anyway, a definite recommend and I will be ordering more soon.", 'reviewer': 'Kendall R. description: ABOUT ANTHEM ATHLETICS We create high-performance athletic apparel and equipment for combat sports and functional fitness including MMA, BJJ, Muay Thai, Boxing, Kickboxing, Jiu Jitsu, Submission Grappling, Wrestling, Pankration, Krav Maga and WOD training. Our products are designed, developed and tested for the highest level of athletic competition. If you have any questions regarding any of our products (e.g. sizing, fit, style, etc.), please email or message us. THE ANTHEM ATHLETICS DIFFERENCE Because we don't pay for celebrity endorsements, we are able to create and sell ultra-high quality performance apparel and equipment at a price 25 - 50% lower than other high-quality brands. We focus on and pay for what performs; it's that simple. 30 DAY, MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE We believe we have created some of the top performing combat sports performance gear on the market today. We stand by our products 100%. If you are not satisfied for your purchase for any reason, we offer a 30 day, money-back guarantee.

questions: [{'body': "I don't I see a thumb in these gloves. Can anyone confirm no thumb?", 'answer': 'There is no thumb padding. There is only padding where your front four knuckles meet the mitts. These gloves are meant for fast cardio mittwork and should not be used on a heavy bag. ', 'num_of_votes': 1, 'num_of_answers': 4, 'answered_by': 'Loyal Dean', 'date_answered': '2018-01-18'}, {'body': 'How do you clean the gloves and pads?', 'answer': 'With a warm damp cloth. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Vince Volpe'}, {'body': 'How big are the gloves and mitts? Do they fit bigger hands well?', 'answer': "They fit me nice and snug kind of tight. ", 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'S. Yoder'}, {'body': 'Will it fit a 4year old kid?', 'answer': 'No it is quite big for a four year old but my seven year old trains in it and my two year old tries lol. But no more fit for 10 and up. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'michelle'}, {'body': 'what does units mean under size?', 'answer': 'Units refers to the quantity or number of fitness kits. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'American Tools Inc.', 'date_answered': '2019-03-16'}, {'body': "I'm going to be using them just for hitting the pads they come with, will i need to wear tape? or would i be fine if i didn't?", 'answer': 'Using the gloves will be just fine. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'Vince Volpe'}, {'body': 'Should I use hand wraps with these gloves?', 'answer': 'Not necessary. keep in mind your hand size  related to unique size of the gloves ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'Tyrone'}, {'body': 'Are these ok for sparring also?', 'answer': 'I wouldn’t use them for that, the pads are pretty thin and hard. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Vince Volpe'}, {'body': 'Do a dvd come with it.', 'answer': 'No Dvd does not come with it. reviews: [{'header': 'At-Home Workouts!', 'body': 'I bought this for myself and my husband as way to keep us active even during the winter, rainy months here in the PNW. When it is so wet and cold outside, the last thing i want to do is leave my home to go to the gym so this is a great way to get some cardio and strength training in! My husband gets a workout from it too just from absorbing my punches. All in all, I would highly recommend this product for anyone trying to stay or be more active from the comfort of your home!', 'reviewer': 'DeeRange', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-03-03'}, {'header': 'These are great quality for what we do and I love that ...', 'body': "Obviously, I homeschool. My son is my only so we have a distinct tendency to get on each others nerves. He is also special needs and bullied relentlessly. Being the Mama Bear that I am, I saw that it was time for him to learn some self defense. These are great quality for what we do and I love that he has to focus on where to hit. **settle down, we don't condone violence but I'm not going to let him get his head kicked in either**Also, when we need a short break or are frustrated with each other, these do a lot to take the edge off of a day and I have found that more times than not, we end up laughing too hard to really get into it. We're getting a hanging punching bag next! Definitely recommend!", 'reviewer': 'The.og.mrs.p', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-03-26'}, {'header': 'Great set!', 'body': "The options to choose from was overwhelming so wasn't sure I made the right choice until this set arrived. I did! The gloves and the pads fit both my husband and myself. We switch off wearing them to work out. Good quality that we expect to last for a very long time.", 'reviewer': 'roco', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-02-06'}, {'header': 'Good product, and improved over its last iteration.', 'body': "This is my second set after beating the old ones to pieces. The old ones were sturdy, but these are an improvement in terms of wrist and knuckle protection and encourage the user to hold the correct position for boxing. The mitts, thank goodness, now have a target in the center, so I find I'm quicker switching back and forth because I don't have to refocus on the mitts to hit the center. The old mitts lacked a target. I've used them for over two months now and they're holding up well.", 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-11-19'}, {'header': 'amazing product', 'body': 'this is amazing for the price. its super durable. ive had my pair for about 4 months and they show no wear or tear. they are light weight and breathable so your hands dont marinate in sweat. no complaints here', 'reviewer': 'Devin b.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-05-25'}, {'header': 'Great price', 'body': 'I love these gloves they offer great protection and durability i bought two sets one for me and one for my father and they are amazing would buy again', 'reviewer': 'Aaron', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-09-10'}, {'header': 'Tough and Durable', 'body': 'My spouse, son, and I use these to have a little fun around the house! Also, these are perfect for my 11 year old son to release a little pent-up aggression! Being 11 is tough, and when there is a kid at school that knows how to "push buttons", these are a healthy way to release that tension! These are durable and offer enough padding that I can take a punch from the hubby with no pain.', 'reviewer': 'FMRace', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-04-03'}, {'header': 'Nice Solution for Kids Needing to Release Some Aggression!', 'body': "Purchased the Everest Boxing Fitness Kit for my son's 12th birthday. reviews: [{'header': 'Great Value - even better than expected', 'body': "I bought these for my son who is a boxer and has an upcoming match. Over the last few years he's tried other brands but Anthem is now his favorite for all of his boxing gear.", 'reviewer': 'Mary B.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-17'}, {'header': 'Great trunks', 'body': 'Awesome boxing trunks', 'reviewer': 'Brian Todd', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-26'}, {'header': 'Nice fit, nice look.', 'body': 'Very nice boxing trunks.', 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-18'}, {'header': 'Perfect for the price', 'body': 'Ideally id want hublot/jordan trunks but dont have the 2k usd to get them. these are absolutely perfect for my build. highly reccomend.', 'reviewer': 'julio villarreal', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-03-06'}, {'header': 'Awesome trunks great for training and workouts', 'body': "Love them, just what i needed a high waist and comfortable. There's no inseam rubbing or tightness that can cause discomfort. 1st day of having them and i did my full workout and they are comfortable and dont sag or fall off waist.. i have other training shorts--(non boxing ones) and they are terrible and sag too much and fall off. I like anthems boxing trunks/shorts. They have the right fit and i even got some lower back support out of them.. they stabilize the waistline and are not too bulky perfect fit, these are awesome!", 'reviewer': 'Elijah Mettler', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-04-23'}, {'header': 'Fits well.', 'body': 'Good fit with a nice wide elastic waistband to keep them up. reviews: [{'header': 'Lightweight, but has some substance.  My favorite MTB shorts right now', 'body': 'Lightweight, but has some substance. My favorite MTB shorts right now', 'reviewer': 'B. Williams', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-23'}, {'header': 'Good shorts but consider buying a size up', 'body': "These are nice shorts. Feel durable, comfortable, and look good too. The length goes to just below the knee. They come with a padded liner(underwear) attached by two small straps that can be cut if you wish to use your own or if you don't want to use them at all. I personally cut the liner so I can use them casually while not riding.I wear a size 36 for most shorts/pants. I ordered a size 36 and 38. The 36 I could barely button even with the straps loosened as much as they would go. They were also somewhat tight around the thighs. The 38's fit much better but a little loose. With the straps tightened it's okay and I've been riding with no problems. I recommend going a size up if you're going to buy these.", 'reviewer': 'Cy', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-04-27'}, {'header': 'Run Small', 'body': 'The shorts are great, bought my usual size 30 but they were too tight, went up to 32, they fit but just a little loose, guess I need a 31. But I would just recommend going up a size from what you usually wear.', 'reviewer': 'Brad Davis', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-23'}, {'header': 'Husband win', 'body': 'When he loves an outfit - he wears it all the time. These pants made the rotation!', 'reviewer': 'Samantha Christy', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-25'}, {'header': 'Comfortable for all day riding!', 'body': 'Love the shorts and the included padded liner (which is removable) is very comfortable for all day riding. However, I did ha e to go up one size than I normally wear. I wear a 32 normally but had to get a 34.', 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-05-12'}, {'header': 'True to size, look great on/off bike, comfortable.', 'body': 'I am 6\'2" 185lbs. Size 34 fits me great, and they seem to fit the same as all of my other size 34 shorts/pants. In my opinion, these looks great and can be used for casual wearing. They are secured with a single button, and I have had no issues with the button coming undone while biking. they have high and deep pockets, and I don\'t feel like my keys will fall out (maybe unless you are doing backflips or something). They are decently long and are a really \'normal\' length, falls at about my kneecap while standing. The material seems to be strong and reinforced (I\'m not a clothes material expert, but they seem to have a subtle \'criss-cross\' sticking that seems really durable. These are probably my favorite pair of shorts, on or off the bike. The \'FOX\' logo is quite a bright orange, I like it, you may not if you have a more subtle style.', 'reviewer': 'GRK', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-09-18'}, {'header': 'Excellent product.', 'body': 'Best shorts ever', 'reviewer': 'Jonathan', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-13'}, {'header': 'Fit is spot on', 'body': 'Excellent fit and quality riding shorts', 'reviewer': 'Mike Glefke', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-05'}, {'header': 'Great in the shorts!', 'body': 'Love em! My only MTB shorts!', 'reviewer': 'Dan Willmann', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-06'}, {'header': 'Good fit', 'body': 'Came with cushioned lining and was true to size.', 'reviewer': 'Nikki Zurawski', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-01'}, {'header': 'Pricey, but excellent shorts !!', 'body': "I put on a lot of miles. I hated shorts and always rode in bibs but decide to try these and love them. Fit amazing, look good and very durable. Liked 'em so much I bought several pairs - very picky when it comes to MTB shorts - hated wearing them - not anymore , these rock. I'm a 33 and the 34's fit me perfectly.", 'reviewer': 'Apopleo', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-12-15'}, {'header': 'Great shorts with a liner', 'body': "I'm very happy with these shorts. Fox makes great shorts and I really like the liner that comes in some of them. I like to carry my phone in my shorts when I ride and the side pocket is barely big enough to hold my Samsung Galaxy. The older Ranger Cargo has a bigger side pocket, but these shorts are going to work out great as well.", 'reviewer': 'Bryan Christensen', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-09-27'}, {'header': 'No complaints', 'body': 'Size was spot on for me, I’m 6’2 187lbs I wear a large and it works. Light and adjustable also simple with no zippers', 'reviewer': 'GapToad', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-10-27'}, {'header': 'Awesome', 'body': 'Love these shorts. They are durable and made a great material', 'reviewer': 'Chris', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-11-29'}, {'header': 'SEEMS GOOD QUALITY.-', 'body': 'So far I just used it once but from the 3 hour MTB ride yesterday in warm weather I can tell these are good quality, nice fabric and perfect sizing. They have an internal short with the respective cushion.', 'reviewer': 'Federico Poggioli', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-03-28'}, {'header': 'Perfect shorts!', 'body': 'Awesome shorts and liner. description: The Ranger mountain bike shorts pack trail-specific technology into a casually styled short that performs both on and off the bike. The stretch Ripstop fabric ensures maximum performance and superior durability. The waist adjusters are easy to adjust and extremely comfortable. The inner waistband features TruDri technology to move moisture away from your skin and keeps you cooler and drier.

reviews: [{'header': 'great product!!', 'body': 'great product! i know its on the expensive side for muay thai shorts, but the quality and material shows on these muay thai shorts specially how they always sell out fast! the slits on the sides are wonderfull for kicks and more free too be able to throw them more efficiently but these designs on ea shorts are great and different from other muay thai shorts. ive used them for about 2 weeks now training everyday, washed them everyday and the quality of the shorts stayed as i when i bought them! A+ on quality and design.the fit is true to size if you like it snug around your waist stay too your size, i used to wear running shorts so im used to the snugness. if you want more room get a size bigger.', 'reviewer': 'Mark pascual', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-21'}, {'header': 'SO COMFY', 'body': 'Very Comfortable and They Turn Heads In The Gym', 'reviewer': 'Marlon', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-01'}, {'header': 'Dope af', 'body': "Muay Thai needs more hip art and materials like this (Not everyone wants weird shiny shorts with totally un-flexible, bordering on offensive text or symbols across the front or back). Give us these dope designs and this killer fabric that actually moves with our body. Well done, make more please. description: About Us SINCE ITS INCEPTION IN 2010,YOKKAO HAS ESTABLISHED ITSELF AS A MARKET FOR EXCELLENCE IN DESIGN AND MARKETING FOR FIGHT GEAR AND ATTIRE IN THE MUAY THAI WORLD. YOKKAO BLEND TRADITIONAL MUAY THAI GEAR AND FIGHTWEAR WITH THE LATEST, FASHIONABLE DESIGNS. Muay Thai is widely recognized as one of the most effective stand-up striking styles. It is practiced by professional combat athletes for competitive purposes and also by enthusiasts around the world. Read more         A unique and innovative design combined with a high-grade embroidery, make these Muay Thai shorts the perfect gear for a good boxing equipment whether you are training and fighting on the ring or not. Their flexible and elastic waistband will ensure a great and reliable support while, thanks to the super lightweight fabric, you won't even remember you are wearing them! Also, the side slits will allow for a greater flexibility and optimal movement. Our fight shorts are made of premium quality yellow satin and black carbon fiber fabric. Carbon fiber helps to make the shorts more resistant while keeping them very lightweight. All Yokkao gears are handcrafted by our professionals in Thailand, providing the best quality in every single detail. Read more Read more         Read more         Read more Read more

Nice range of motion', 'reviewer': 'Idris', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-10'}, {'header': 'Great muay thai shorts for the bigger person !!!', 'body': 'If you are a bigger person, with a 40\'ish or larger waistline, and those XXL venuume shorts you bought that say they will fit a 40 inch feel like you are wearing a girdle... Then these are the shorts for you. Awesome shorts, and takes away the headache from trying out a bunch of brands sized to fit a smaller region of people. XXXXL or XXXL shorts made in Thailand may only fit a 36" American waistline, etc. You have to go through trial and error. These shorts fit and feel awesome, add a pair to your shorts line up/rotation, and you will not be disappointed. The G2 version has a more aggressive slit than the original and seemingly larger openings for the legs which adds a lot of freedom of movement. My only gripe is you're more exposed for that added freedom. A pair of short boxer briefs solves that problem. Great pair of Muay Thai shorts!", 'reviewer': 'vitruvian7', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-09-09'}, {'header': 'Love anthem products', 'body': 'I’m just under 5’6” and have been training 4-5 days a week. I’m fit but I have a little pudge. I range between medium and small in most things so I bought one small and one medium. Both are great and I have plenty of range of motion when throwing all my Muay Thai moves. The small fits great if snugger and the medium fits perfect but with a bit more leg room. I prefer the small because I don’t like a lot of extra fabric and I don’t have the largest of thighs. For folks who have pretty large thighs, medium is probably best. Happy with all of it.', 'reviewer': 'Loren', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-11-18'}, {'header': 'Great shorts for the price', 'body': 'Great product for the price. I’m 6’1” 180/185 lbs and have around a 32 waist and the larges fit me pretty perfect, haven’t had any issues or annoyances while training yet. These are the best and I will be ordering more - comfortable and affordable!", 'reviewer': 'Shannon L.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2019-04-12'}, {'header': 'Fits perfect and I can train better', 'body': 'High quality, full range of movement, comfortable', 'reviewer': 'Javier Vega', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-12-05'}, {'header': 'Looooooove these and will order more!!', 'body': 'Loooooove these shorts. In terms of comfort, may take a second to get used to the short length, depending on how you ordered it, but that is most likely just getting used to boxing as a beginner.', 'reviewer': 'Jtenbarr', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-05-21'}, {'header': 'Great Shorts for the Price', 'body': 'Love the material and fit of these shorts. Stephenson', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-14'}, {'header': 'Nice', 'body': 'I wear this for my first K1 fight it was great.', 'reviewer': 'AHMAD', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-09-25'}, {'header': 'Awesome shorts for the money, and great company to deal with!', 'body': "Can't say enough good things about these shorts. I train Muay Thai four days a week and these have not let me down at all.On a separate note I can also report that this companies customer service is outstanding! I ended up (regretfully) returning their shin guards because they just simply didn't work for me. One of the co-owners of the company contacted me shortly thereafter and personally inquired into my issues and concerns with the shin guards and made sure that all was well. Can't say enough about a company that actually cares for the customers wants and concerns.I will be buying more of their products in the future.", 'reviewer': 'Jonathan', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2016-09-21'}, {'header': 'Well made, will last.', 'body': 'Had this pair and a "Retro" pair for about 1 1/2 years, still looks good, no issues. On this pair, there is this lining on the inside of the legs where the \'Star and A\' is and it is coming apart. I am not sure what purpose it serves, and presents NO issues in look or use. Plenty of movement for kicks, & knees, good for Muay Thai. My waist is 34, got large, it might have been a 36 when I bought them! I like the "Retro" ones better, but if you think those are a little too short then get theses.', 'reviewer': 'Bulldog', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-11-18'}]

description: Muay Thai is a fighting technique sport that originated in Thailand, It is a legendary fighting skill and promoted in the world. It mainly uses the human body's double fists, legs, elbows and knees to attack, and it is known as the strongest fighting skill. We have 12 years of experience in the made martial arts clothing and have a very good reputation in this field.The NAMAZU MUAY THAI SHORTS was produced by our factory. It was made of 100% polyester satin fabric and carefully sewed by professional workers, premium and durable. Thai shorts ultra high-grade,tear-resistant,smooth and soft, comfortable to wear and it is the best choice for many muay thai enthusiasts. If you are looking for some high quality thai boxing shorts,Welcome to order our products. We promise to give you the best products and service. All your requests and feedback will reach the most satisfactory reply within 12 hours. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!Thank you Warm Remind: Not machine washable
features: 100% Polyester$$$Elastic closure$$$1. DESIGNED FOR MARTIAL ARTS The muay thai shorts are designed aggressive leg side splits stretch, it allows you maximum kick motions and full flexible play to advantages. strongly elastic waistband with drawstring that stick tightly to your waist to keep from fall off.$$$2. HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL Fight shorts are made of 100% polyester satin fabric, ultra high-grade,lightweight,smooth and soft.moisture-wicking technology,comfortable and breathable to wear ,it is especially suitable for martial arts fighting.$$$3. METICULOUS SEWING The boxing shorts are elaborately sewed by professional tailor workers,sturdy and durable, tear-resistant,and the exquisite hand-embroidered totem on the grappling shorts looks very powerful.$$$4. MULTIPLE SHORTS STYLES Muay Thai Training Workout shorts are available in a variety of styles,you can choose the style you like.How to choose the right size? Please refer to the specific sizing chart table(last product image).$$$5. EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE Thank you very much for your interesting in our products. The muay thai shorts are exclusively produced by our factory.If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will give you the most satisfactory reply within 24 hours.

reviews: [{'header': 'It’s a great product!', 'body': 'Will encourage others to purchase this item.', 'reviewer': 'Dot', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-24'}, {'header': 'My Second One, Because Its That Good.', 'body': 'I love this bag and have for a few years.This is my second one I just bought since I had to leave my old one behind when I moved.This is not a heavy "heavy bag" for power blasting, for that you really need a heavy hanging bag. I appreciate everything about the way this bag moves with me and the required force to move it since its ample for attaining skill and not just impressing myself with my power.This bag is extremely durable and has enough resistance and movement to get you working angles and learning to move your head while still keeping you honest with your power shots.The only small downside is the large size of the base. That said, I don\'t know how else the bag would remain upright or be as stable as it is.I fill mine with water for easier mobility and this works fine since I use if for accuracy and angles more than power.Very easy on the fists.', 'reviewer': 'bwguyer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-10-03'}, {'header': 'Son loves it', 'body': 'This was a present for my son who loves boxing. He\'s 14 5\'11" and 250 lbs. A big boy. He can jab at this all day and it still stands strong. Putting it together was easy. It\'s so much nicer than I expected. The only problem I had was filling it. The process was ok but if you get any water on top of the base it leaks out. Wasn\'t a lot because the hole is big enough to fill with household bucket but just keep a couple towels around it just in case. I would definitely say buy this. Worth the money.', 'reviewer': 'KikiRose0987', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-01-05'}, {'header': 'Neverlast', 'body': 'Trash, good product if you only want it to last a year, bottom cracked and became useless, dont buy', 'reviewer': 'Juliwon', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-04-28'}, {'header': 'Love it!', 'body': "Easy setup minus the adding sand part. The hole is too small and it took forever to fill with sand. Quality is great and works awesome. Very durable. Just wish the spring wasn't as noisy when it moves.", 'reviewer': 'Charles Scott Moore', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-03-22'}, {'header': 'Great bag for a beginner or someone with experience', 'body': "I was working out at a Muay Thai gym and wanted something I could do at home on days I didnt want to go in. As covid cases rise in my area I am taking a break from my gym and Im glad I have this. I filled it with water and not sand and it is incredibly sturdy and I do not have any issues with leaking.I have relatively strong punches and kicks and while the bag has quite a bounce back, once you get a rhythm going it works in your favor. It's great for boxing workouts and Muay Thai/kickboxing. Be aware that if you are shorter ( I am 5'4) knees can be quite difficult even if you have the bag on the shortest setting.It took less than 45 minutes put together. Once it's filled with water it is incredibly heavy so make sure it's placed where you want it because it can be hard to move.", 'reviewer': 'Juliet Gomez', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-02-12'}, {'header': 'Not a heavy bag for power punching but you can get work in.', 'body': "Not a heavy bag and you can't explore your power punching with this piece of equipment but you can still get work in. Cardio, combinations, foot work, punching and evading the bounce back. For the price this is definitely a good piece of equipment especially for beginners", 'reviewer': 'Aaron G.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-12-16'}, {'header': 'Love!', 'body': 'Bought for my son and I to get some exercise and get some frustrations out. Works great. Great Quality. Highly Recommend!', 'reviewer': 'Danielle Findley', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-02-05'}, {'header': 'A perfect punching bag.', 'body': 'For a while I have wanted a heavy bag/punching bag. This bag from Everlast is just what I wanted and more. It’s easy to put together, sturdy and just fun to hit and workout with. People have said it can be a pain to fill with sand, for me it wasn’t that bad. I set the base at an angle against a space heater and filled with a water bottle for a funnel and a measuring cup to scoop. It took about 75lbs of sand and only around 30-45 minutes. It’s not going anywhere when I hit to now and it’s SO MUCH FUN! After a bad day at work or just to get in shape, this bag is perfect!', 'reviewer': 'Taylor', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-03-09'}, {'header': 'Started off strong, ended up with a lopsided bag after 3 or 4 months', 'body': "It's a pretty solid bag, easy to put together, and its great for working out. reviews: [{'header': 'Reviewing the size chart is important!', 'body': 'I love these shorts so much I actually fell asleep in them lmao. I highly suggest using a tailor’s tape measure to measure your waist to get an exact fit in these. The size chart is accurate. I’m a hefty 5’6 (170cm), 220 lbs (99kg) male with thicc legs. Roundhouse kicks feel way better in these than regular workout shorts', 'reviewer': 'zellebellee', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-10'}, {'header': 'Beautiful Shorts, Sizes Run Larger', 'body': "Hi there, this is my first pair of Hayabusa Thai shorts. The design and comfort is a 10/10 and I really love them; however, for women's shorts, they run bigger than any brand I have ever tried. I typically wear a medium in fairtex, twins, yokkao, any other Muay Thai short; however, these were quite spacious in size medium and I returned them for a small. I am a slim/athletic 6' 150 pound female and even the small fits a bit big. I cannot wear them as pictured because they are too long and roomy in the legs, but they fit best when I roll the waist band. If you have a problem with Thai brand Thai shorts being too tight in the waist band, definitely go Hayabusa. I am keeping them because they are pretty, very comfortable and well-made and still will give this short 5 stars even though it isn't the best fit on my body.", 'reviewer': 'A. Wide leg opening.  Performance satin.

reviews: [{'header': 'Awesome', 'body': 'Comfortable and hot looking', 'reviewer': 'suntan6977', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-12-02'}, {'header': 'Short and Sweet', 'body': 'If you are entertaining purchasing these shorts you are already looking for something SHORT so no sense belaboring that point. The fabric has a very satin-like feel as you would expect and is very comforable next to the skin. I wear 33 and 34 inch waist in jeans and slacks and at 6 feet 190 lbs, athletic build, the M fit very much like you see on the model. Color rendtion on my monitor as close as it could be to the real product. Still enough flexibility in them to do other exercising besides boxing. Leg front will roll up occasionally. Take your chances wearing these in public venues as they do advertise your package. Probably good to wear a little something under them for swimming, etc. Overall the fit is very close to what is advertised. Had these about a month and am very pleased with my purchase.', 'reviewer': 'TK', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2014-07-14'}, {'header': 'wet look shorts', 'body': 'I wished it was more satin wet look, it would have been better. but that is all right.', 'reviewer': 'David Richards', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-07'}, {'header': 'Looks Great', 'body': 'I really like these. By far one of my favourite purchases thus far.Be wary when wearing them in public as they leave little to the imagination if you don't get the right size.", 'reviewer': 'lido ', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-07-28'}, {'header': 'Just the style and fit I have been looking for', 'body': 'I bought four of the five colors after trying one on for size. The sizing is true to what I expect for a medium / 32" waist; I do like the drawstring waist. I like a square cut style but not the \'spandex\' that I have seen. These shorts are not like that at all. The length is not too short, and the leg openings are not tight (at least not for me, but I don\'t have or expect to have muscular thighs). description: The Venum Elite boxing shorts are made of high quality polyester to ensure lightness and durability. The material allows total freedom of movement and due to their reinforced seams, the shorts will have a long lifespan to accompany you in your training and fights. The wide stretch belt s an excellent fit for the athlete. The shorts efficiently attach to the waist thanks to a drawstring design, and will keep up with your footwork without running the risk of slipping or riding up. On the aesthetic level, their appearance adapts to every style of fighter and will be suitable for all levels, beginners to professionals.

reviews: [{'header': 'Look like a champ', 'body': 'A great fit. Makes you look and feel like a fighter.', 'reviewer': 'Edward Manick', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-11-03'}, {'header': 'Read the Standard Size Chart carefully.', 'body': "I love my country, and I also enjoy watching the Rocky boxing movies. The design caught my attention. I am 6'2'' and I have about a 30 inch waist. I was debating on whether or not I should buy the adult medium or adult large. In the end, I chose the adult medium. While the shorts reach my kneecaps in length, they are a tight fit around my waist. The adult medium is supposed to fit waist sizes between 34-39 inches. However, this is not a problem. These shorts also don't have pockets, so it's probably best not to wear them if you plan on traveling to several places throughout the day.As the instructions indicate, it's for the best not to wash them in the washing machine. One should hand wash it for no more than 10 minutes. The fabric is weak; they feel like boxer briefs. Though, I don't mind it. However, you shouldn't wear them during weight training sessions. The sleeveless hooded jacket fit my body frame just fine. The stars on the sides of the shorts are so cool. These are the longest boxing shorts I've seen because they're like basketball shorts. They look like they're hard to keep clean, so take good care of them. As long as you purchase the correct size, I highly recommend this product.", 'reviewer': 'James F.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-04-18'}]

name: ZOIC Carbon Liner Short - Men's
details: {'Product Dimensions': '13 x 12 x 2 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ZOIC', 'Department': 'Mens', 'Date First Available': '2013-03-31', 'Manufacturer': 'ZOIC', 'ASIN': 'B0822TK81Q'}
questions: [{'body': 'Are these worth it over the orange model?', 'answer': 'Yes, I prefer them for my longer rides 25 plus miles.  In my experience they have better cushioning and fit.  I fell they are worth the expense. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 3, 'answered_by': 'Michelle L'}]
reviews: [{'header': 'They solved my biggest complaint about long rides', 'body': 'The best compliment I can give a product like this is that I don’t think about them or my butt at ALL when riding. I have struggled with sore butt, saddle sores, and private parts going numb on rides for almost 2 decades. These shorts have solved virtually all of my soreness/numbness problems. After buying my first pair of these I found I stopped wearing all of my other liner shorts and have since bought more of these and thrown away my all the other liner shorts.', 'reviewer': 'James Ferry', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-11'}, {'header': 'I was doubtful, but the carbon liner really is comfortable all day', 'body': 'My Zoic shorts are my favorite thing to ride in. I go for long distance on a gravel bike. Started with the essential liner that came with the shorts, a huge improvement over street clothes and bib shorts. Then I bought the premium liner for long rides, which was an improvement over the essential. Now I have the carbon liner, which they say is for “all day” on the bike, and oh my god it is SO MUCH better. 8-9 hours and 100-120 miles on the bike and I don’t ever feel like my butt hurts or I need to stand on the pedals just to get off the seat. I was expecting a marginal improvement, but these liner shorts are the absolute best. Beyond impressed, and really happy with my purchase.', 'reviewer': 'Andrew', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-05-09'}, {'header': 'Love these Liners', 'body': 'Love these Liners. Used on long rides 50+ mile with no issues', 'reviewer': 'Michelle L', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-29'}, {'header': 'Great product', 'body': 'Perfect for my mountain biking. Love the fit!', 'reviewer': 'Matthew J. Salmon', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-08-11'}, {'header': 'ZOIC is the best', 'body': 'Comfortable', 'reviewer': 'Simpson', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-09-17'}, {'header': 'Worth the extra dough', 'body': "I've had plenty of mtn bike shorts/liners before and was usually disappointed in how long they lasted so thought I'd spring for these and glad I did, more comfortable than any other liner and have lasted far longer than anything previous, too. Wished someone sold them here.", 'reviewer': 'Camper Van Beethoven', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-11-15'}, {'header': 'Zoic Short', 'body': 'These are the greatest cycling short I had. description: Zoic's Carbon Liner doesn't actually use carbon, but it does rock an Italian-made Elastic Interface MTB Performance chamois that helps your undercarriage stay comfortable on long rides and races. It's designed to be stretchy, moisture wicking, and anatomically padded, with different foams in different places for extra comfort and an ergonomic profile made for long days in the saddle.

questions: [{'body': 'I fluctuate from 170-185lb and my dress pants are ~30-32w in inches. what size should i go with for this brand? few ppl are saying 1-2 size up but idk', 'answer': '     Hello dear Ricci, we recommend a size M for you ... sometimes people just click on the "size chart" button next to the "select" size button ... and then a size chart from amazon pops up, which is WRONG ... to make sure you see our right size chart, please always click at our last product picture ... PS: if you are in doubt or in between 2 sizes, please take always the bigger one ;) ... ♥ thank you ♥ so much for your trust and support ... sunny greetings, your Siam7 Team see less', 'num_of_votes': 1, 'answered_by': 'Siam7-USA', 'date_answered': '2019-03-03'}, {'body': 'I have a 34 in waist what size do i need', 'answer': '     Hi! The sizes listed are off. For reference, I am a 26-27 inch waist female. Originally I ordered the XS and the sizing arrived as a 22-25 inch waist max. I upsized to a medium which fits great, and would probably fit up to 29 inch comfortably. Best to go for L or maybe even XL if you want to be safe and roomy. The folks who make these shorts sweet, once you figure out your sizing the quality and wait is well worth it! see less', 'num_of_votes': -1, 'num_of_answers': 3, 'answered_by': 'Rebecca R.'}]

details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '12 x 9 x 4 inches; 6.17 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SUGOi', 'Department': 'Mens', 'Date First Available': '2009-11-17', 'Manufacturer': 'SUGOi', 'ASIN': 'B06X3VMTVN'}
reviews: [{'header': 'Great fit', 'body': "So far this has been the best fitting cycling shorts that I have purchased even within the Sugoi line up. Padding in just the right place and amount. Can't say anything bad as they are becoming my go to cycling shorts. Have ordered another pair.", 'reviewer': 'JeanP', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-21'}, {'header': 'Excellent Bike Shorts', 'body': 'SUGOi bike shorts are fantastic and these are the best. For fit, finish, performance and longevity I have found no other manufacturer better and being 6\' 3" and 190 lbs the seat pads are perfectly situated for my sit bones. I have all SUGOi models and use each according to ride length. This RS Pro Short is for any length ride. The Evolution Short is for century rides on down. The Essence Short is for quick 40km rides. I like each model. I don\'t understand other reviewers comments about fit and longevity. Maybe their old shorts stretched out over time and now these new ones feel tight plus they don\'t hang dry them. The waist of the RS Pro and Evolution shorts is a bit tighter than the Essence short but that is my fault for carrying around 5-10 extra pounds on my mid-section. I am still using shorts after 2000+ miles of use and they still look and feel good. Bottom line here is these are great shorts and worth the money.', 'reviewer': 'Diamond Dad', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-01-21'}, {'header': 'Best cycling gear I own.', 'body': 'Great for long rides...have two pair and they are far and away the most comfortable I own. Wish I only had these in the line up, it’s almost disappointing when I don’t get to ride in these! It’s the best (thickest/densest) padding by far and I have several other pairs of brands that would be considered elite. It’s definitely worth the money. One other great feature is the fit...the cut is very comfortable to walk in whether that be pre it post ride.', 'reviewer': 'MRady', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-04-21'}, {'header': 'My go to short', 'body': 'Slightly different chamois than the pairs I bought a few years ago, but just as good. And the waist band on this current design is much better. It’s the only short I’ve purchased in years. My 5th pair overall, and the first two, while worn and thinning, are still in the rotation. Long ride comfort and good fit.', 'reviewer': 'rebs619', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2019-08-11'}, {'header': 'Yes', 'body': "Had been shopping around for better padding and after much looking, decided to go to the top and buy this. This made passing guards and sweeping mounts so much easier as my "partner" / enemy was intimidated after I would flex my muscles and smash them aimlessly into his face. This immediately propelled my skill level far above what it was before. I was so satisfied that I bought 3 more sets of matching LAFROI rash guards and shorts. The effects were cumulative, and now I am at least purple belt in skill level equivalent, and even have subbed coach when I flexed especially hard on his face. I highly recommend these shorts. description: LAFROI Premium Fabric is created to give not only athletes confidence but also every one who equips it. It's so versatile that it acquires both performance and comfortableness at the same time that you would love to take it with you to go anywhere UV Sun Protection UPF 50+ UPF 50+ UPF 50+ UPF 50+ Moisture Wicking & Quick Dry     Fitting Type Compression Compression Compression Loose Fit UV Sun Protection UPF 50+ UPF 50+ UPF 30+ UPF 30+ UPF 30+ Moisture Wicking & Quick Dry      Fitting Type Compression Compression  Loose Fit Slim Fit UV Sun Protection UPF 50+ UPF 50+ UPF 50+ UPF 30+ UPF 30+ Moisture Wicking & Quick Dry      Fitting Type Compression Loose Fit Compression Slim Fit Slim Fit  Inspiration of LAFROI  We have long term non-stopping improvement that we gradually polishing our products to meet wearers' experience. We work with athletes, MMA clubs, and surfing groups to generate data which helps us to make our product more suitable for using. Thus we finally concluded that all our product should be have the following characteristics  UV protection for surfers' need   BJJ, MMA fighters would require quick dry fabric to keep their body dry and cool   Comfortable flatlock sewing to prevent chafing caused by compression gear  Our Story Inherited with the supply chain built up by our elder generation who make garments for 3 decades. We have all the resources we need to make a masterpiece of sportswear The brand is destined to equip sufficient support in the nature. We know what we need when we fight or when we surf, as we make our garment to provide what customer need Establishing a brand is like to encounter a huge wave, some see it as hindrance; but in fighters' eyes, it's a chance. We shall ride on it, and conquer it  LAFROI is composed of 4 scenes - and we see important values from it   Killer whales group together to prevail in the ocean   Sharks' powerful tail affords his strength to hunt   A sail drives the wind to take us to our destination   The wave brings not only the disaster but also the opportunity  Read more

description: On race day you need a shorts you dont have to think about -- your go-to triathlon shorts. Weve got you covered. Our women specific tri shorts is designed with your needs in mind so you can perform your best. All our short seams are anti-friction and flat allowing you to compete without the burn of chafing. Youll find not only the flattering wide waistband to be super comfortable but also the streamlined single-layer engineered leg gripper. We use a high-quality tri-shorts fabric that provides UV protection, feels luxurious against your skin and keeps you cool, dry and comfortable. The fabric forms to your body shape without feeling restrictive. And the second skin, moisture-wicking feature aids in evaporation, helping keep your body cool for optimal performance. Our shorts works well, too, in the gym and in cycling classes. It also pairs perfectly with our FX tri top for complete, comfortable competition wear. Triathlon Specific Pad We created SLS3 to be different from other triathlon companies. We make products for all athletes, thoughtfully. We believe that you shouldnt have to compromise when it comes to the products you use, so ours are designed to be effective and to provide a great experience. Our team of designers and craftsmen make our products from the finest materials to ensure they perform as well as they possibly can. We created SLS3 because we were tired of overpaying for over designed and under performing triathlon gear that is designed for pros. When we asked around, we learned lots of athletes were upset about the situation too, so we decided to do something about it.

other_category: Women's Compression Shorts #823 in Women's Volleyball Clothing
description: The Apex 2. 5 Inch Volleyball Short is a game changer. This volleyball short was designed for you to focus on your game, not fidgeting with your shorts. The inseam in the back is slightly longer than the front, which allows you to stay in true defensive ready position without your short riding up. To compliment that defensive ready position, the wide, non-side-digging waistband is slightly higher in the back! The soft, breathable fabric is held together by side seams which are angled, encouraging movement. The flat front gives you a seamless look and confidence.

', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 5, 'answered_by': 'Will S.'}, {'body': 'I’m 5”5 180, 190 if I ate too much that month,should I want them to be short on me should I get the xl?', 'answer': 'Size changes in waist not length of shorts and wear waist trainer ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Guttababii'}, {'body': 'What does it say on the front?', 'answer': 'It says "มังกรหยก" which means Jade Dragon ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 3, 'answered_by': 'Abraham LeBlanc'}, {'body': 'I’m 5ft11 and 280lbs. Is there a size for big guys just getting started', 'answer': 'Try 3x, I’m 220 and the XXL have a little bit of room, if they don’t fit try out Fairtex ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 4, 'answered_by': 'Luke Elmore'}, {'body': "Hello.I really want to buy my first pair of thai shorts but im scared of ordering the wrong size.Im 5'8 185lb 34inch waist & 24inch quads..xl? Xxl?", 'answer': "     Hi Vic; I definitely understand your dilemma having had my share of returns for a larger size. That being said Fluory is a Chinese company and their brand is more in line with western sizing. I'm 5'6, between 175 and 180 lbs. depending on the week and generally wear a 34 in pants/shorts. I found the large to be pretty comfortable for me, for you I would say try the XL. According to their size guide it's for waists 33-35, they have a drawstring if needed. A trick i found with all of my shorts regardless of brand to get some more give in the waist is to remove the tag in the front, unless you're just really looking to advertise the logo this gives a little more stretch. Just tread lightly when cutting the stitching should you choose to do so. Hope this helps. see less", 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Will S.'}, {'body': 'I am a female, 5ft 0in, 137 pounds. My waist is small, 27.5 in and my hips are thick, 38 in. What size should I order?', 'answer': "     I am going to say a small or medium. For perspective, I am a guy weighing 180 lbs., 34 inch waist and roughly 40 inches around the hips. I have 3 pairs of Fluoury shorts in a large, they are a bit snug but not uncomfortable and an XL is too big. The sides have a pretty good flare to them so the hips shouldn't be an issue and the shorts also have a drawstring. Taking an educated guess I would say try a small and see how it fits. One thing I found is that if you remove the cloth name tag around the waist band you'll get a little more stretch, just snip carefully on the stitching so you don't gouge the rest of the fabric. Hope this works out for you. see less", 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'Will S.'}, {'body': 'size I’m 6’2 and 225-230 what size do I need? I wear a Xxl in mma shorts', 'answer': 'They are made small. I would try a 3x. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'RPrice'}, {'body': 'I’m 5’4 138lbs what size would I need?', 'answer': "     They have a size chart on Amazon but it's really hard to read unless you zoom your screen quite a bit. That being said I am 5'6 180 lbs. with a 34 inch waist and I have bought 3 pairs in large. It's hard to say for sure but I think a medium would fit you comfortably. A trick that I learned a while back to give any Muay Thai shorts more stretch in the elastic is to remove the manufacturers name tag, it's a big bulky piece of cloth or leather that has no real function other than advertising. Carefully remove it and voila, instantly more comfortable. Floury shorts are made in China and more true to Western sizing so hopefully a medium works, they also have a pull cord like jogging pants to tighten up the fit if needed. see less", 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 3, 'answered_by': 'Will S.'}, {'body': 'i dont understand the sizing, i have 30 inch waist, also 5 foot 10, 170 lbs. what size should i get?', 'answer': 'Large should be good ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'answered_by': 'Tiger Cub'}, {'body': 'I’m 5”11 and 180lbs.. 32 w.: athletic build.. what size should I get?', 'answer': 'XL I would guess. These are legit. Like for reals.', 'body': 'I’m really impressed. They are beautiful shorts but a tad flashy. I’m not too worried about it... the Thais have pretty wild colors and this red/gold/black combo is relatively vanilla if you ask me.They are very nice quality and the designs feel thick and sewn very well. They definitely feel legit and not like a cheap knockoff.I put 4/5 for the stretch because I had a bit of trouble checking all the way up to meet my elbow with my knee. I’m a fan of the fabric that is next to the hips because they soak up sweat like a sponge but it’s my personal preference. The dragon pattern on the left leg side is beautiful and is what initially drew me to purchase the shorts. Overall I am highly pleased with the comfort, appearance and quality of these shorts; the low price is also a plus for those on a budget or just looking for a good deal. My one suggestion if you purchase these, wear something underneath as they will become quite see through when you start sweating. reviews: [{'header': 'Helps with hernias', 'body': 'Fits good and stops hernia pain', 'reviewer': 'Kristine M. Fasano', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-21'}, {'header': 'Durable and resilient', 'body': 'So far have been durable and no tears. Have washed and dryed in machine a few times and no shrinkage or degradation. Bought another pair. Happy.', 'reviewer': 'Joseph', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-01'}, {'header': 'The BEST compression pants for hyper-mobility syndrome', 'body': 'I am in LOVE with these compression shorts. I have Ehlers Danlos Syndrome and often have hip pain and trouble keeping my hips aligned. I\'m a very active person and when I\'m having a bad flare-up of my hEDS it is hard to work out. These have been a lifesaver! They compress just the right places without being too restrictive. It keeps my hips aligned and my muscles working correctly. It really helped with my knee pain and hip pain. I often wear them after hard workouts too which has helped with stiffness and pain.They are very tight and fit small but that\'s how they should fit. I ordered the large and medium through Prime Wardrobe to find the right fit and the mediums were best for me. I\'ll include my measurements below, the medium fit perfectly.Female/athletic-slim buildHeight: 65"Waist: 26"Hips (at fullest): 36-37"Low waist: 29"Thighs: 22"Normal pants size: 1-3/XS-S', 'reviewer': 'Ren Stogner', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-09-20'}, {'header': 'Great product', 'body': 'As expected from McDavid.Effective compression - but still allows for mobility.', 'reviewer': 'MST', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-01-10'}, {'header': 'Excellent pain relief for hypermobile hips / SI joint', 'body': "I've got Ehlers Danlos Syndrome and my hips and SI joint are hypermobile, so sitting upright has always caused pretty severe pain in my legs and lower back. I just received these and have been sitting in my desk chair for an hour now without any pain, which is huge for me.The fit in the crotch is a little weird because they are cut for a cis man, which I am not, but I was expecting that, and I couldn't find any shorts cut for women that seemed to have the same level of compression and support as these ones, and that was by far the most important thing for me.It sounds silly, but I'm honestly so excited right now to be able to sit upright without pain.", 'reviewer': 'Alex', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-06-14'}, {'header': 'Hip Bursitis, IT Band, Hip Problems', 'body': 'As a woman, I ordered the mens shorts. I\'d say for WOMEN 5\'2" - 5\'5" tall 130-140#, order a mens Extra Large. They run super super small. (I got a size Small in the lighter version of these, but this firm version runs very small). These are GREAT for hip bursitis, hip problems, IT bands, etc. The lighter version is best for under your clothes (nice and thin) or on top or under yoga pants. Both versions helped me. These more rigid version are better for strong support for zumba, treadmill, running.-Mrs. Odessa', 'reviewer': 'Bohemians with Wanderlust', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2019-07-17'}, {'header': '... groin doing martial arts and then having problems feeling like it was reaggravated', 'body': "I bought due to pulling a groin doing martial arts and then having problems feeling like it was reaggravated. That is, they scootch up a little on the anterior side or the thigh; but, then, again, I cinch them up a little between my package/crotch area and top-medial thigh. They wear fine for my purpose, i.e. keeping all the stuff in place while I run/jog. The bummer is that after use, probably simple chemistry from sweat and body temperature, THEY SMELL LIKE AN INDUSTRIAL ACCIDENT IN WEST VIRGINIA. The super-bummer is that that noxious odor adheres to your skin (the whole girdle region). So, whether you want to smell like that or not for nookie is one thing; remaining fact is you'll stink if you sit down for coffee after having heated them up and sweat. These could not have been user-tested, just a template from the eighties using contemporary versions of Spandex and Polyester. Return 'em if they stink.
