I am a medium waist (34," maybe a little less). The shorts are very snug as I would expect compression shorts to be. These are a little shorter than I thought they would be (and seem to be in the picture) but still work fine for me. ', 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'Jon kaye'}]
reviews: [{'header': 'Great for waterskiing!', 'body': 'I use them as compression shorts under my bathing suit for waterskiing. They are awesome!', 'reviewer': 'CJH1', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-31'}, {'header': 'Works week needs fly', 'body': 'I like these pretty well. They are well built. I just wished they had a fly.', 'reviewer': 'Uncle John', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-27'}, {'header': 'A Life that was Fulfilled', 'body': 'I was stuck in ditch.Not literally, but metaphorically. I had hit rock bottom at about 13 years of age, wearing the least I could of Hanes and Fruit-of-the-Loom boxers on the daily. Everywhere I looked, people surrounding me were have the time of their lives. Of course, the time of their lives was because of their high quality Calvin Klein boxer briefs and Under Armor compression shorts. 2 years had gone by living with the agony and distress of only wearing boxers. I was 15, and thought I should be hitting the weight room soon. I Before I got to the gym my first day, I expected to see others that looked just like me working out. When I got there, my heart deflated. Others were wearing similar athletic shorts, and a cutoff or short sleeve shirt. But I could tell that wasn\'t it. Just observing the way they walked, they way they talked, how they interacted with others, I could tell without a second thought that each and every one of them were wearing compression shorts. I, of course, was the only one wearing boxers. Things just weren\'t working out in my teen years. I was 16, and starting to take more control of the decisions I made in life. I had just recently entered my payment method onto my Amazon account, and was buying things such as biographies for history class, accessories for my camera, and other small things. I was at a friends house playing ultimate frisbee. We decided that it would be shirts vs. skins, and my team was skins. I removed my shirt, and let the beautiful beams of sunlight run through my skin. It was a great game of frisbee, until I looked down to see my boxers showing from under my "The Come Sail Aways" shorts by Chubbies. The past 3 years of my life flashed through my head and down my nerves to make ever nook and cranny feel a shiver, and I sprinted a straight for miles back to my own home. I got there, Opened my computer and went straight to the amazon website. I had no idea what I was doing at the time, but I knew it was right. I clicked the search box, paused for a second, closed my eyes and took a deep breath. The words flowed through my fingers like florida sand into the search box: "Compression Shorts". I scrolled through the results clicked on the \'Champion Men\'s Powerflex Compression Short\', and checked out. The old expression, "No guts, no glory", may seem like an old folk song to some, but when you witness something that calls upon a substantial amount of bravery, the four words have an exceeding depth of meaning. Thank you, Amazon, Champion, for allowing me to wear these comfortable undergarments, that have made my life better at an insurmountable profit.', 'reviewer': 'Luke', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2015-09-06'}, {'header': 'Nice & Tight', 'body': 'I ordered these because my husband needed “extra tight” underwear for an upcoming vasectomy. They served their purpose. For that brand, you can’t beat the price!', 'reviewer': 'Nisey W.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-04-15'}, {'header': 'Simple, comfortable, and stretchy', 'body': "I generally wear a size 34 waist in pants, I have muscular thighs and glutes, and my body fat is at about 17%. My legs aren't super huge, though, like some athletes, but I do have trouble finding jeans that fit well on me. I ordered the Large size of these shorts and they fit snug, but they're not overly constricting, and that's how I like them. I had owned a pair of XL champion compression shorts in the past which fit me but were not as tight as I personally like, so I sized down with this order.In terms of quality, for about $12 a pair I think these are a very good value. They're very light weight, soft, with a comfortable waist band and no stitching or tags that feel annoying. They're not thick material, they're really more of an undergarment than a true compression short. But I only needed something that was very stretchable and 100% non restrictive, and these fit the bill for me in that regard. I wear these as bottoms while weight training with nothing else, there's no fly and they don't become see-through when stretched, so I think they're fine when used as an outergarment. I could care less about appearance in the gym, I wanted something that was functional with deep squats and deadlifts, these shorts work perfectly for me.", 'reviewer': 'LT', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2015-05-31'}, {'header': 'These are my favorite. The Champion brand is great', 'body': "These are my favorite. The Champion brand is great. For guys like me, if you're out there and have a waist size that seems to vary from product to product between a 34, a 36, or sometimes even a 38? I know...but for those out there who know what I'm talking about...here is one thing to know: Champion runs small, I personally think, in pretty much all of their products, whether it's shorts, hoodies, briefs, or even shirts. For these, if you are about a 36 in most products, I personally find the XL to be the most comfortable, but to each their own. If you are a 34-36 I would go with a Large vs. a Medium, again, just out of comfort and not be wearing a product that was overly tight or constricting but the value and quality are amazing with these. I also LOVE the C9 Champion briefs for everyday use. Those are my go to! Nothing touches the C9 brand. They just are tough to find these days in terms of the fact that the C9s used to be even higher quality than they are now! But this brands is right up there with the C9 quality I feel.", 'reviewer': 'Nate Mc (Columbus, Ohio)', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-03-26'}, {'header': 'Quality compression shorts at a GREAT price!', 'body': "In the past, I paid 3x the price for the Nike-brand compression shorts on Amazon. Don't get me wrong, the Nike shorts were great but you really can't justify the difference in cost compared to the Champion-brand shorts. The quality of the Champion shorts are almost the same as the Nike shorts but the price is so much lower. Think about it - you can buy three pairs of the Champion shorts vs a single Nike short. I've had the Champion shorts for over two months now and use them for my daily gym workouts. They still look new and show no signs of wear. I really like all the Champion-brand products. They produce high quality stuff at a very low price point. You won't be disappointed...", 'reviewer': 'Ed_Laster', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-01-01'}, {'header': 'Tight fit, excellent construction, extended wear', 'body': 'I wanted something a little thicker, I bought large, I’d say they’re tight, but not in anyway restrictive < which I can’t tolerate,, well Constructed, breathable, 6”, I could wear to the gym & work, I get chafing bad, so excited to have found these, I’ve always liked the Champion Brand ,,', 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-01'}, {'header': 'Shorts were fine', 'body': 'The shorts worked fine.', 'reviewer': 'Joe Einertson', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-02-21'}, {'header': 'Great underwear for lifting.', 'body': 'These shorts are super comfortable. They allow complete, unrestricted freedom of movement along with just enough support. I can squat all the way down with no tightening or binding, and they keep "the boys" out of the way. They also breath well. They don\'t feel hot or sweaty.I wear them as underwear for weightlifting. Be aware that they are not meant to be worn by themselves. There is a ventilating mesh strip that goes along the inseam and crotch that makes them breath really well; but it would partly see-through if you were sitting cross-legged. If you throw some gym shorts on top, it\'s the perfect combo.I bought XL\'s by accident when the size chart said I should be in a large, but the XL\'s fit perfectly. My waist is 38 in, which the chart says is a Large. However, I have reasonably thick thighs and glutes; my legs are 28 inches at the upper thigh and I am 43 inches around my hips. So if you have a little meat on your legs, order a size up.', 'reviewer': 'dutch-irish', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2015-08-24'}, {'header': 'Great compression shorts for the price.', 'body': "I'm very pleased with these and the price is great compared to most compression shorts. I had my first pair for about 6 months and didn't have any rips or holes so I purchased 2 more and haven't had any problems. Most shorts from other companies develop holes where my thighs chafe, but the Champion Powerflex have a wide strip of mesh between the legs so the seams don't receive the same wear and tear that as in most shorts. I have not had any problem chafing through the mesh. The only downside I've had so far is that the legs are a little too long for me, they could stand to be an inch or two shorter, but I have short legs for my waste size so others may not encounter the same.I've used these for hockey many times and they still work just fine with an athletic cup and under pads. I've also run a few half marathons in these shorts and haven't had any problems.", 'reviewer': 'Chris', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2014-12-09'}, {'header': 'Tried them all, this is the best choice', 'body': "Having tried the expensive Mava compression shorts and the slightly cheaper Hanes, the Champion shorts are the best of the bunch and at a very good price. The Mava is a bit too snug, not to mention expensive. The Hanes shorts are a bit too loose. The Champion shorts are the Goldilocks of the bunch: just right! They are snug but not too snug, hold everything in place, wash easily, and are inexpensive. I've since ordered several more. For long runs, these are my go-to compression shorts every time.", 'reviewer': 'Crispix', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-02-20'}, {'header': 'LOVE these shorts', 'body': "I LOVE these shorts, they are perfect for preventing thigh rub, can be worn for all activities under layers or just on their own if you're brave or shameless like me! They are a single layer so not too thick and have lots of stretch. I normally wear a large but went with an XL to be safe based on other similar products I've worn and I'm glad I did! Perfect amount of stretch to wear on their own for running and prevent the dreaded thigh rub, not tight or pinchy but comfortable and form fitting. I have some old pairs of under armor that were getting worn and these are the perfect replacement! If you're unsure on sizing and/or have thick thighs go with the larger size.", 'reviewer': 'Nickolas L. Scott', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-09-09'}, {'header': 'Holding together nicely through regular use', 'body': 'Lots of these kinds of clothing have pretty weak seams and tend to rip only a few months after having them but unlike other brands and choices I have tried before these like Puma or Reebok and Adidas, these are holding up perfectly. Would recommend.', 'reviewer': 'Adam', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-05-20'}, {'header': 'S little snug.', 'body': 'They are great for comfort and support. I am a 32 waist and a solid medium. The waistline is a little snug. Hoping they stretch out a little.', 'reviewer': 'AmEricazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-08'}, {'header': 'Excellent undies!', 'body': "As a guy that's a little overweight, I bought these for these for work. Since I move around so often, I find that the chaffing had become too frequent and very miserable. I find these to be very comfortable. I wear them for 8 hours a day at work, and sometimes more. They never ride up, they're very comfortable (unless you sit for long periods of time), and have completely eliminated and problems I've had with thigh chaffing (chub-rub). I'll absolutely be purchasing more of these in the near future.It's worth mentioning that I read through several reviews before committing to my purchase. Lots of folks say to order a size larger. I wear a size 32x32 jean. I fit in the Large compression shorts perfectly -- so I encourage you, as many others have said, to order a size larger.", 'reviewer': 'Dustin', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2015-09-15'}, {'header': "The 'boys' love these.  Edit 5/6/17", 'body': "Excellent product with nice support where it's needed. I love these and I'm a hefty guy.Edit 1.0 - I ordered three more pair at a later date and noticed these fit tighter than the first couple of pairs. After some checking, the manufacturing process has been changed and frankly, I think for the better. The first two pair I received had a perforated front panel and I've noticed after wearing for awhile, the perforations are snagging and ripping. This three new pair have a solid front panel so I believe they will wear longer w/o snagging. I also think this is why they are tighter. Still like them but you might want to go up a size if the perforated 2x are already a bit snug.", 'reviewer': 'Barry Robinson', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2016-12-17'}, {'header': 'Impressive for us bigger guys', 'body': "I'm a big guy that has recently lost 75 lbs. I have always had issues with larger sizes and the fits. These are truly perfect. I bought the 2x and was expecting them to fit, but to be too tight or to pinch, or to have the waist band roll. None of that happened. These fit perfectly all around. I have worn them to workout, and with some of my closer fitting jeans. No issues, and they stay cool as advertised. Even the crotch is well stitched, plenty of room for the stuff without pinching of leaving you hanging so to speak. I will update after I have used and washed these more to see if they lose any of the quality. So far so good.", 'reviewer': 'Edju', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-02-10'}, {'header': 'A definite CHAMPION', 'body': 'I bought some red ones a while ago and they were FANTASTIC. I went and got two more. I definitely see why bigger women or women in general were things of this nature. I just make putting on pants easier and feels good. I am a bigger guy so some times i get some bigger guy wedgies and such...with these they keep my underroos in place. (Yes I still wear underwear with these are you not suppose to?). These also help with that dreaded thigh rub problem when talking a lot. I walk about 2.7 miles to work each day and use to get some wicked thigh rub action....these bad boys nipped that in the bud. I highly recommend them for anyone especially bigger guys.', 'reviewer': 'Stephen Ruvkun', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-04-07'}, {'header': 'Awesome', 'body': 'I\'m an avid hiker and wore these on a weekend backpacking trip recently. After quite a few miles and lots of sweating, I can\'t recommend these enough. Ultra comfortable. Did the job. I barely even realized that they were there. I can\'t speak to the longevity of these yet, but after a pretty heavy duty initial test, I\'m really impressed. These are way better than my Under Armour and Nike compression shorts.They do run a bit small. I\'m around a 32" waist usually and tried the Medium first. I had to go up to a Large which were perfect. I am also a cyclist so I do have large thighs, so you may have different results.', 'reviewer': 'Palm', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-08-01'}, {'header': 'These protected my thighs like..', 'body': "Cant say enough about these. I got tired of getting sweat friction rashes on the insides of my thighs when traveling to humid environments and finally researched and found these. What a godsend! These protected my thighs like....a Champion. Felt pretty good to and I think reduced some fatigue. I'm a 36-37 waist with average sized thighs and these fit very well. Also wore them under swim trunks that were shorter than average and they worked great, couldn't tell I had them on. They dry out really well. I'll be buying more of these! There is hope for fat Dad bod dudes like me!", 'reviewer': 'PKS', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-05-18'}, {'header': 'but other than that they have stood up to some pretty heavy abuse', 'body': "I don't remember how I got my first pair of these, but after wearing them for a few days I went out and bought 10 pairs the next week. These have now entirely replaced my regular underwear, and go well with everything. I wear them daily with my duty uniform, and after work when I go to the gym. I have worn them in all types of weather from -20F to 110F, and would never choose anything else. I've only had a problem with one pair, and that was because they got caught on some Velcro in the wash, and the waistband got torn to shreds, but other than that they have stood up to some pretty heavy abuse. Ruck marches, runs, swimming, sand, gravel, they take everything and keep on performing.", 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2016-02-12'}, {'header': "I also didn't feel like spending $40 or $50 on a pair of compression ...", 'body': "I have large thighs and I keep rubbing holes in my boxer briefs when I run. That's why I bought these. I also didn't feel like spending $40 or $50 on a pair of compression shorts. These fit great and they work perfectly. I don't notice them at all when I'm running and while I wear these often (I've had them for just over a month at this point), I haven't even come close to wearing as hole in them. I'm actually about to buy another pair so I can rotate between them and they can last even longer. For reference, I run about 2 - 3 miles a day, 4 - 5 days a week, and I haven't any problems with these at all.", 'reviewer': 'RaymondGW', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2016-09-25'}, {'header': 'Just might be the best!!!', 'body': "These just might be the best compression shorts I've ever owned, I just got them today and will be looking forward doing some cardio and running. I bought both black and white pair and along the sides and underneath where you junk hangs have tiny preparated holes (check pics). The material is high quality and fits nice and snug. The cut is also perfect for me (5'7 180lbs) since the ends of the shirts rest on a perfect part on my thigh, where I don't have most of my thigh under compression wrap, but just the right amount at parts of my thigh that would rub together causing skin irritation. I warn enough compression shorts in my days to know that once I put these on I knew that they were a winner.", 'reviewer': 'CaddyLs305', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2016-01-12'}, {'header': 'Great buy! I normally purchase nike or under armour ...', 'body': "Great buy! I normally purchase nike or under armour compression shorts but I thought I'd give the champion's a try. I first and foremost love that they are half the price of Nike or Under Amour. 2nd they fit well and like many other said, the material feels thinner than your average par of under armours, they still get the job done. I do like that these have a mesh type area that allows them to breathe better than the UA/Nikes. The only thing I don't like, and it's very minor, is the waist band. I prefer them a bit thicker and the champion is thin.Overall would I purchase these again, and will probably only buy champion from now on.", 'reviewer': 'Chuck', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2015-04-28'}]

questions: [{'body': 'What is the difference between the xxxx-xl and the 4xl? they are the same price, but have different colour options. are they the same size? thanks!', 'answer': 'Hello.  We\'re sorry for the confusion, but for some reason Amazon messed up this listing a bit.  The "4XL" size is exactly the same as the "XXXX-Large" size. ', 'num_of_votes': 2, 'answered_by': 'Aero Tech Designs Inc', 'date_answered': '2017-10-13'}, {'body': 'Anyone know if these make good swim shorts? Loosen too much in water? Fade in chlorine?', 'answer': "These make ex ellent swim shorts, didn't loosen up when wet and dit not fade from the chlorine.   If you want them to cit snug, I would suggest buying one size smaller.  They are not loose. ut fit more like swears than tights.  Hope this helps. ", 'num_of_votes': 1, 'num_of_answers': 2, 'answered_by': 'DIANE SHROUT'}, {'body': 'Would this make for a good "walking" pair of shorts? I don\'t want chub rub! lol. Help?', 'answer': "     Yes they do make good walking shorts. They provide some support but not as much support as a good girdle. However they do have a seam that runs on the inside of the thighs. This makes for some interesting noise when you walk its not incredibly loud but it is there. Another positive to them is the moisture wicking fabric. A girdle provides more support and mine doesn't have a seam on the inside of the thighs but it holds in the heat and makes me very very hot. These do not. Also while damp when I take them off they are not ringing wet and stinky like the girdle is after I've been walking. they do provide some support but not as strong of a support as one of my girdles. I have found that i can wear these all day very comfortably and they provide about a medium level of support. see less", 'num_of_votes': 1, 'num_of_answers': 3, 'answered_by': 'Taffy'}, {'body': 'I have a 48 inch waist, which one fits me?', 'answer': "Hello. Thanks! ", 'num_of_votes': 0, 'num_of_answers': 3, 'answered_by': 'Aero Tech Designs Inc', 'date_answered': '2016-06-27'}, {'body': 'where os the size chart?', 'answer': "     Hello! reviews: [{'header': 'Chub rub resistant', 'body': "love these though I may have ordered one size too large since I have been losing weight. I wear these for power walking and was looking for something that did not wear through in the inner thigh area after 5 wears. These fit the bill and they are super comfortable. They aren't cheap but neither were the name brand heat gear shorts I was buying and they were lasting less than a month. These are by far a better deal.", 'reviewer': 'heidiw', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-10-06'}, {'header': 'Probably not the average use for shorts such as these...', 'body': 'I bought a pair of these, size 4X, for my mother. She has a medical condition called lipedema that causes abnormal fat tissue to accumulate without any normal cause. This makes finding clothing for her difficult because one side of her body is larger than the other. When her doctor told her to wear compression shorts, we both weren\'t sure where to even look. I bought these for her without much hope of a good fit, but was quite surprised. They fit my mother well, and are super comfy. She was so happy with these shorts that I bought 2 more. The shorts offer some compression but aren\'t too hard to get on. That is to say, these aren\'t medical grade compression and with that they aren\'t as difficult to get on as medical grade compression garments. As for other information concerning the fit, my mother is 5\' 2" and the shorts rest about 4 inches from her knee, they do not ride or slide up, and 4X (the size ordered) is what my mother would normally wear.', 'reviewer': 'Keener', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2017-11-03'}, {'header': 'they seem like they will do fine', 'body': "I just got these today and I'm impressed. I have to admit I wasn't getting my hopes up. I bought these to wear in the pool. I have not wore them swimming but will review again once I do, they seem like they will do fine. These are well made, good quality bike shorts. They have some light compression to them but are not overly tight in the least. I have big thighs and still feel they have enough compression to stay put on the legs but not cut into the skin (perfect!). I'm going to feel totally comfortable in the water! Thank you! I would also think these would be great under dresses to prevent chafing. They have been through a summer of OCR runs and no damage to the shorts whatsoever. They are extremely comfortable both by themselves or under capris or my kilted running skirt. reviews: [{'header': 'Perfect', 'body': 'As I said in my last buy. I like them! I have replaced all of my underwear with these and couldn’t b happier', 'reviewer': 'Mike', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-14'}, {'header': 'These are the best shorts you will ever purchase.', 'body': "Let me tell you a story about my underwear.I like spandex-type compression shorts. I think they are the superior underwear. No problems with bunching, easier to tuck a shirt in, if that's something you have to do. Works well with all sorts of pants, even tighter dress pants. Keeps your wobbly bits in place. Just a very versatile article of very important clothing.I previously wore Under Armour shorts, and they were nice, but they seemed to wear out quite quickly.I brought these Neleus shorts on a whim, something like 30 dollars for three pair.Time went on.They were nice shorts. I wore them every day under every kind of pants.I attended weddings in them, worked three different jobs with three very different styles of dress and exceptionally different levels of physical activity.I very rarely re-wear underwear without washing them. Generally just if I wore them around the house for a few hours the previous day.They got washed a lot.I noticed the other day that they were getting a tiny bit thin, so I decided to order more.I looked back in my amazon order history trying to find them.....and I looked back farther...............and farther.....Five. Years.The last time I bought underwear was five. Years. Ago.These three pairs of Neleus shorts lasted me five years of wearing, sweating, running, climbing, washing.One lucky pair survived a car wreck that spelled the demise of everything else I was wearing that day.These are some of the greatest shorts you'll find. Ever. Hands down.Buy them.You won't be disappointed.", 'reviewer': 'Matt Smith', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-10-07'}, {'header': 'Some of the best I’ve purchased!', 'body': 'Love these, fit great!', 'reviewer': 'teampritchard', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-04'}, {'header': 'My thighs are thanking me already', 'body': "I've only had these for a few days and worn them a few times, once to school and once to work (separate days) and as a heavy set guy (over 250 lbs) I am pretty used to chub rub between my thighs since my thighs are quite large and my other underwear tended to ride up my nether regions, and since I wear jeans all day and am quite active running from class to class and working at a grocery store, I got quite a bit of chub rub, but not anymore! The past two times I've used these, I haven't gotten any chub rub and I feel a lot more comfortable since they aren't going anywhere. I don't feel any riding up! I wasn't expecting to already want more but I do!", 'reviewer': 'Abe Feldman', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-02-02'}, {'header': 'Really helps with recovery!', 'body': 'I really like using these compression shorts underneath my regular workout shorts. I feel like they helped recover with lower body workouts and activities such as running! Would definitely recommend!', 'reviewer': 'Scott', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-05-14'}, {'header': 'Very comfy', 'body': 'these things are really nice', 'reviewer': 'C Gifford', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-05-26'}, {'header': '4 for the price of 3', 'body': 'The compression shorts are extremely comfortable for running, look nice underneath 5” seam shorts. No chafing, no discomfort. A great purchase! Plus I received a 4th pair (potentially a packaging mistake lol)', 'reviewer': 'jake', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-03-08'}, {'header': "A great alternative when it's hard to justify $30/pair", 'body': 'First off, the material here has a texture more like cotton and not the silky feeling of latext compression shorts you might find with Nike and/or Under Armor.I have a couple of pairs of Nike & UA compression shorts but needed another pair for those busy weeks where I can\'t keep a pair freshly washed. I don\'t *need* another enough to want to spend another $30 so I thought I\'d give these a try.So far, I\'m very satisfied. As others have mentioned, they do fit more snugly through the "midsection", but the waist/thigh fit was as expected. I\'ve found them comfortable despite the fit running a touch snugger than I usually wear.I also have found I can wear these comfortably for much longer than the Nike/UA material and I\'ll likely be back for more as they functionally do exactly what I\'d like them to do, and I may not have a desire to replace my others when the time comes.The 3-pack for the price is a great value and don\'t feel like I can ask for much more.', 'reviewer': 'Evan', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-02-08'}, {'header': 'If you need compression, order smaller', 'body': 'I first bought xl. That is what Amazon suggested. He wears a 2x on top and 36 jeans. They were way too big. I returned and ordered med. 6', 'reviewer': 'Sheila', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-02-14'}, {'header': 'well made.....totally comfortable....', 'body': "wear under uniform shorts....great fit...don't ride/bunch up...material not abrasive...stays cool hotweather.....length for me ends just above the knee....over shorts about the same length.....with some stretches/drills/activities.....about an inch or 2 of compressions can show.....but colors are great so doesn't really matter...i like them.....", 'reviewer': 'jb', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-12-25'}, {'header': 'Great pseudo compression underwear', 'body': 'Always worn boxer briefs, I wanted a pair for working out that didn’t roll up and saw these randomly and figured why not, Never looking back, these fit tight without feeling the least bit uncomfortable, thought they’re silky soft, never roll up, never move, working out in these feels great, like wearing nothing but still having support. Already ordered another set and gonna get another, these are my new everyday drawers.(Also been through several washes, no signs of loosening elastic)Feb. 2022 update: Had these pseudo compression shorts/underwear for awhile, Worn and washed many times and still goods as new, no stretching of any part Still recommended.', 'reviewer': 'RICK L.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-05-30'}, {'header': 'Great compression shorts', 'body': 'These compression shorts are great. I am a VERY ACTIVE 40 year old man. Gym 7 days a week, outdoor activities weekly also with a 33" waist, typically I wear 34" in pants (easier to get with a 34" inseam). I read a few reviews and decided on the XL, Glad I went one size larger. So they are not overly tight. They do their job, and hold "stuff" where it\'s supposed to be held. They do not ride up, great for gym use, under my mesh shorts. Follow the merchant sizing, not the Amazon sizing, like other reviews suggested.Keep in mind these are NOT underwear, they are compression shorts. So when people complain about not having a front access/hole....NO CRAP PEOPLE! These are a modern day jock strap, not underwear.If you want a pee hole, then buy tight underwear. If you want compression shorts that do their job, don\'t ride up, and are affordable...then I suggest these.I bought a 3-pack of black, I plan to buy more so I can do laundry less often.', 'reviewer': 'Cory D', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2019-08-13'}, {'header': 'Nice shorts!', 'body': "I'm female and hate wearing women's shorts!! Bought these and really like them! Lightweight, soft, just the right amount of compression without being uncomfortable. The waistband is the make or break for me on workout shorts. These have a fairly short waistband that is not too tight, or scratchy. Doesn't flip over either! The colors are nice too! Really like these shorts!", 'reviewer': 'Mhib', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-10-13'}, {'header': 'Comfortable stretchy and the right fit', 'body': 'I like that these don’t constrict the legs as much as other brands, they have a generous seat, so if you have a larger backside they still fit properly. I’ve recently started a workout program so we’ll see how well they hold up', 'reviewer': 'Dan', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-11-22'}, {'header': "You've arrived at the right holder for your boulders.", 'body': 'My urologist recommended compression undies for the week after my vasectomy. They work to keep newly sensitive twig and berries in stasis and ready for frozen peas.The vasectomy didn\'t go well (you know things have gone awry when the small talk between your doctor and nurse grinds to a halt and you hear him say "lower the table so I can get some leverage"). However, these bad boys did their part in the recovery process. And they have also been great for more cardio-centric workouts. Who\'d have guessed?They also, unfortunately, form a compressed target for my son\'s foot.Worth the price of entry for the green pair alone. I often strut around the house wearing just these and a smile telling my wife to "make way for the sexy lime." She usually rolls her eyes and says something like "That\'s inappropriate while my grandparents are here."Stand by for photos.', 'reviewer': 'MJS', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-08-07'}, {'header': 'Worth It!', 'body': 'Great compression for working out 🏋🏼\u200d♀️! Being a former offensive lineman, 6’5 300#, Helps with hip flexor and hamstring problems!!!! Enough room for the boys when doing legs! Might consider a smaller size for a stronger compressions for my hamstrings!', 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-09-20'}, {'header': 'Great fitting tights', 'body': "I'm pretty picky about my tights, (use daily, all day) and was skeptical, but I was in a bind, no pun intended, and I ordered hoping they would work.Surprisingly, they're a great fit, for workouts and as underwear.They work better than I could've imagined.", 'reviewer': 'Deep south Texas football coach', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-16'}, {'header': 'Exactly as advertised', 'body': 'These are exactly as advertised. The legs are a little longer than what l’m used to but they provide the support and comfort I wanted at a great price. I was a satisfied customer of their work out shirts so enjoy their brand.', 'reviewer': 'delson', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-28'}, {'header': 'I LOVE THESE SHORTS!!!  XL fits just right I’m 6’3 250 lbs', 'body': 'Love these shorts!! I used to buy under Armour for the last 10 years or moreAt $30 a pair. I still like under armour but I thought i would try these at $23 for 3pairs. I am very happy with these they are more compression than under amour and more comfortable also I just hope they hold up as well. Bought 12 pairs love them!!!', 'reviewer': 'alvin coburn', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-18'}, {'header': 'Perfect fit', 'body': 'Very comfortable and fits well. Make my long walks go well.', 'reviewer': 'Femi J', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-12-22'}, {'header': 'These work out wonderful..', 'body': 'I have been using these for over a year at this point. This underwear does not ride up or fall down. It fits as the fit sheet said. I have purchased several sets now, to fill out the number I needed.. It has lasted longer than others I have tried. I am still using the original set I purchased. Most other brands lasted about 6 months and I had to get rid of them.', 'reviewer': 'St. Ben', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-01-20'}, {'header': 'Look No Further, These Are Fantastic', 'body': "I was a strict classic boxer guy for years, preferring to wear a jock at the gym rather than to suffer through the uneasy self-conscious feeling of wearing briefs. I'm not sure when or how I stumbled across Neleus compression shorts--I think I was just looking for something a little more secure--in any event, I loved the first three-pack I bought. Shortly after, I spent the same amount on one pair of Reebok compression shorts and while they were equally great, they were 3x as costly for literally the EXACT SAME level of comfort. Since then, I think I have maybe 15-20 pairs of these compression shorts. They have replaced every set of boxers I owned (I hate doing laundry so I've got a lot!) and normally I don't write reviews but I felt compelled to do so with these...they're comfortable, durable, and are awesome for the gym, the trail, or everyday life. Two enthusiastic thumbs up.", 'reviewer': 'B. D. Miller', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-10-30'}, {'header': 'Surprisingly Comfortable and Wonderful Quality', 'body': 'So I really took my time when I was searching for undergarments. I have used Under Armour, Adidas, Champion, 2XU, and many others in the past to stick to primarily 2XU and UA, these are amazing. I was reluctant because of the price point, but let me be the first to say that these are wonderful! The fit is not as much compression as others (like 2XU) but the material is super soft, very comfortable, and they breath wonderfully. The colors are slightly different from the photos, but that was to be expected. I love the waist band on these; though they ride a bit higher than some of my others, the waist band is soft and very comfortable. Honestly, I forget that I even have these on they are that comfortable; so much so that I may purchase more to replace some of my underwear. For the price point, great product and value. Give them a shot!!!', 'reviewer': 'James', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-06-29'}, {'header': "My first compression shorts, I'll be back for more", 'body': 'I purchased small, and I have a 30" or waist. They have less compression than I was expecting, but I am a cyclist used to sturdy compression in my cycling shorts. So to me they feel a little on the larger side of small than I had hoped. These have turned out to by my favorite shorts so far for daily use otherwise, and I am planning on getting more.Likes: leg length! Flat seams inside and out. Leg opening is not too lose or tight. No exposed rubber of any kind that I can tell (I am extremely sensitive to bare rubber) No fly= No washer lint build up.Uhh just ok: the seam placements need care while putting on for proper alignment to the body. Moisture wicking ability is not great or bad.Could be better for me: compression is lighter than hoped for. If they are not put on with care to align seams, they can rub the wrong way.', 'reviewer': 'MobyBike', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2018-03-30'}, {'header': 'Family Jewels', 'body': 'The Neleus Compression shorts saved my marriage. Yes, I said it. My wife, who I love with my whole heart, was disgusted with me. Not because of the way I act, but the way I looked. Whenever we would do something active, my bulge was on and poppin. Unintentionally, I was making friends and family uncomfortable. Then I ordered the Neleus 3 pack. I went from an accidental sock puppet jumping around in my shorts at every stride, to a calm, cool and collected athlete. I can’t thank the product enough.', 'reviewer': 'FMountain', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-07-13'}]

reviews: [{'header': 'Nice fights shorts', 'body': 'I like that it has an interior pocket for mouth guard. Good fit very light weight. Looks great too. It say hand wash only. I washed mine in a bucket w just a tiny bit of detergent and air dry in the desert heat. Don’t know if they would hold up in the dryer but if you dry just dry it solo or with other light garments. Yes I recommend these shorts. Waist is roomier than similar shorts which I sent back which were snug on me.', 'reviewer': 'Amazon Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-06'}, {'header': 'Quality', 'body': 'MMA Training', 'reviewer': 'Karen Rattanni', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-15'}, {'header': 'Happy', 'body': 'Very lightweight product great for sparring or any kind of workout not sure how long they may hold up with heavy groundwork', 'reviewer': 'RWS', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-28'}, {'header': 'Pleasantly surprised', 'body': "I was very hesitant to buy these. I'll say that right off the bat. MMA shorts for 10 bucks? No way, too good to be true.Not quite.Pros:-They're comfortable as heck. Like, seriously, I pop these bad boys on under my gi pants for BJJ so I can just slip the gi pants off for combat conditioning or the rest of my workout and I sometimes forget I have them on.-Easy to wash, hang up to dry, and go for the next class.-Quite honestly the best workout shorts I think I have, and I basically live in athletic/MMA shorts.Cons, sort of? They may all just be me issues...let's call them minor annoyances than cons:-The drawstring is just...weird-Also I have to put the velcro on over my belly button, where it seems to fit but then I can slide them down to my waist or so? But can't put them on velcro and all over my waist? Maybe that's my body size (Female, wide hips) but again, minor annoyance I can work around it.ALSO THE CLEANING LABEL: I know it says hand wash, or implies it, but you can toss these bad boys in a cold water wash and hang dry. I do this twice a week or so when I toss them in with my BJJ stuff, they've held up just fine. If you have a delicates setting on your washer and you're hesitant, use that. But a normal wash in cold water and hang dry has worked fine for me.All in all, I'm pleasantly surprised with these, and will be buying more soon", 'reviewer': 'Kendra', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-02-13'}, {'header': 'Good product', 'body': 'Very comfortable and super lightweight', 'reviewer': 'Richard Reyno', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-05-11'}, {'header': 'No bad but the ripped', 'body': 'They ripped on one side after a year use', 'reviewer': 'Albert Manzini', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-05-01'}, {'header': 'Good value', 'body': 'Hold up great and are extremely light', 'reviewer': 'Michael Slenkamp', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-04-16'}, {'header': 'Best buy for buck', 'body': "I now own 5 of these shorts.They are perfect for running, boxing, muay thai, weight lifting or even just hanging around the house. I wear a size 36 in pants and shorts but my actual waist measures 37 1/2 inches. I'm 6 foot tall and weigh 200 pounds. I found the XL(size 36) fits perfectly. With the draw string and velcro I could go up or down 2 inches in waist size. The shorts covers just below the knee but is very stretchy and I've experienced no problem rolling on the mat. The only problem that I have is that in some positions I get in while training the crotch of the shorts stand up like I'm overly excited lol. Other than that its light weight, stays cool and very comfortable. I haven't tried this yet but I'm sure swimming and surfing would also be perfect in these shorts considering they dry extremely fast.", 'reviewer': '626', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-11-05'}, {'header': 'So good I bought 2 additional pair', 'body': 'I love these shorts, they are super comfortable and fit weel. They move with me offering no resistance (I am not a super high kicker yet) that I can detect during workouts.I got for up to 2.5 hours at a time and spend about 9-10 hours a week in the mma gym wearing them and not 1 time have I even been conscious of them. Its great not having to worry about your wardrobe messing you up by binding, pinching, etc.', 'reviewer': 'Dan', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-28'}, {'header': 'So comfortable!', 'body': "So comfortable, lightweight, and breathable! Perfect fit, and the drawstring & velcro make them a bit adjustable but they will stay secure during workouts, unlike basketball shorts which tend to get loose with activity and require periodic adjustments. They're basically very soft, thin board shorts but they allow for much more movement. Perfect for jogging, mma, martial arts, gym etc! Can't beat for the price. I'll definitely be ordering more, and I'm sure I'll be using them as lounge/everyday shorts too!", 'reviewer': 'DWhalen', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-06'}, {'header': 'Awesome quality for an incredible price!', 'body': 'I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS BRAND! I have two of their adult GI after seeing the quality I bought a pair for my wife and kids too, I also got their rash guards top and bottom and their shorts very high-quality products for a very good price👊🏽I highly recommend them absolutely love HAWK!', 'reviewer': 'Radman', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-07-26'}, {'header': 'A must buy for MMA shorts!', 'body': 'I have two pair! Absolutely love them. I train MMA 5 days a week for at least 2 hours each time. Which I rotate with other mma shorts. By far these are the best. I have worn them over a year at least once or twice a week. They are still holding up great.', 'reviewer': 'Matt Hiatt', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-09'}, {'header': 'You can wear these anywhere, and at anytime.', 'body': 'There is nothing that I dislike about these cross training gym shorts. I actually bought these for my wife, but I made a mistake on the sizing. I no longer do no-Gi Jiu Jitsu workouts so I just comfortably wear these around the house. They are crazy comfortable.I would imagine that wearing these gym shorts while doing work outs would be just as enjoyable.Good quality, fit is perfect and they are super lightweight. A great value for the money.', 'reviewer': 'Tduubs76', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-10-13'}, {'header': 'Good fit, great price', 'body': 'No idea why anyone would spend $70 for a pair of grappling shorts...silly. These fit great, are comfortable, look good and at $13 you can’t go wrong. Even if they don’t last forever, the name brands don’t either, they’re still an amazing value. Wish they had other colors, I’d buy more', 'reviewer': 'AJ', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-06-01'}, {'header': 'Strong material', 'body': 'The shorts fit well and are made for intense training', 'reviewer': 'Clinton elwell', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-10-29'}, {'header': 'Great shorts, Great service.', 'body': "These are great shorts, especially for the money. They have no external pockets to get caught on, but they have 1 internal pocket for a mouth guard or something. They have an internal draw string and they are fastened closed with overlapping straps of velcro.I ordered 2 pair and received 1 that was labeled large on the outside package, but the shorts were medium. I contacted the seller and they sent me the correct size, and didn't make me go to the trouble of sending the wrong size back to them.Overall I'm happy with the product and the service, especially for the price! If I need more shorts I will be buying more of these.", 'reviewer': 'Christopher H.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2019-08-16'}, {'header': 'Great shorts at a great price', 'body': "Are you kidding?? MMA shorts for less than $20?? I was feeling like this was too good to be true but I've used these shorts for no gi jiu-jitsu, Muay Thai and even CrossFit workouts and they've been awesome. I'm a decent sized guy and the shorts fit great. Not too restrictive but not too baggy. Will have to see how they hold up over time but right now I'm super satisfied. Great value for the money!", 'reviewer': 'Kindle Customer', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-08-03'}, {'header': 'Very lightweight and stretchy', 'body': 'Was a little stetched out at first but went ahead and got it anyways and happy I did. I train MMA almost everyday and wear these 3 days out of the week and hasn’t ripped or anything. Pretty happy with the product especially for the price. If you train mma or boxing etc I would def recommend getting a couple of these shorts.', 'reviewer': 'Jacob Bernier', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-11-15'}, {'header': 'Great for kickboxing and some grappling', 'body': 'I wear them for kickboxing. They work great and have a great cut. They are lightweight and breath/stretch well. I have not used them for heavy mat work, but feel confident they will hold up for moderate grappling. I am 5\'10" 220lbs and 38 inch waist. XXL was a great fit. Company was very responsive when I asked about more colors. I already ordered a spare pair, while the price is still low.', 'reviewer': 'Eric K. Swanson', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-02-28'}, {'header': 'Quality shorts', 'body': 'Got mine in today and they are really nice pretty true to size slightly loose at the waistline but not like gonna fall of or anything. They do have a draw string for tighten so order your typical waist size but def gonna get a few more pairs 100%', 'reviewer': 'Ryan Gilbert', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-11-19'}, {'header': 'Amazing Product!', 'body': 'I am a 12 year old girl and Ive been doing Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu for 8 years. Newton', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2020-02-24'}, {'header': 'Fantastic!!', 'body': 'I bought these shorts with the leg and torso rash guards. I’ll definitely order from Hawk again because of their low prices and excellent customer service.', 'reviewer': 'Katie', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2019-11-25'}, {'header': 'Fits like a charm.', 'body': 'These look and feel amazing. description: Trample your opponents with our limited edition IBJJF LEGAL jiu jitsu shorts. Perfect for training or competition use, these mma shorts for men & women are available in the classic Black, Blue, White, Red, Purple, Pink, Orange, Military Green & Gray. We've taken it that one step further this time - check out the ultra light 125gsm micro stretch fabric featuring our trademarked hawk jiu jitsu logos design that not only looks awesome, but also makes sure youre not an advertisement board on the mat. Here's some more features of our black shorts. 125gsm Ultra Light Micro Stretch fabric with same color double stitching. Y-Vent design of the bjj shorts for jujitsu ensures a perfect tailored cut fit. 360 degree ultimate movement with tripple stitched lycra stretch crotch panels. Hook & Loop Velcro closure with extra inner rope drawstring. There are no outer pockets for the ease of cross training shorts . These men's shorts can also be used as cycling shorts. These workout shorts / gym shorts come with a hidden pocket for mouthguard. High-tech embriodery hawk mma shorts logo on the front leg. Order your men's shorts today for a great bargain. All Hawk fitness shorts are preshrunk. We recommend you to hand wash these women shorts . If your waist falls in between different sizes, we strongly recommend to choose the larger of the two sizes.  MINIMUM PRICE & MAXIMUM QUALITY: We bet, you would not be able to find a sports shorts / mma shorts for men at this price in the gym clothing / mma clothing / gym clothes for men market. #HawkSports to join our growing community of strong people :)

name: Anawakia Men's Compression Shorts with Zipper Pocket Running Workout Athletic Underwear Spandex Sport Shorts
reviews: [{'header': 'Perfect hidden stash pocket… So helpful!!!', 'body': 'Purchased for my son who’s constantly losing or leaving behind personals that cant be kept safe in open pockets on short.. it’s driving me crazy!! After having to replace drivers license, key fob (neither is cheap to do btw!!) his bank card and cash- I went looking for a solution for when he’s in his workout mode… Anawakia compression shorts were our salvation!!Fit as expected- ordered XL and for comparison: he’s 19yo, 6’5”, 189, 33x36 with an active but not overly athletic build as he’s just coming into that adult/manly body.. he got height first!! He prob. could have fit a large- but, XL will provide room to fill out on his athletic grind of late! At least he’ll be doing so without losing his gear- Yay!! Didnt realize short had dual zip pockets so, a total bonus! Pocket is just wide enough to fit a cell phone and has no issue fitting ID/debit size wallet and/or key fob for sure! Zipper’s smooth like butter and doesn’t catch on edges- shorts really have a lot of attention to quality and detail.Mine wears like underwear with basketball shorts and they hug nice to body allowing him to do so w/out excess bulk.. fit is ideal he also pairs under his adidas athletic pant without issue. The slick and soft material is non irritating and provides support in all the right places lending confidence to keep junk in its place- without the look of revealing too much! That’s always a good thing.. Whew!Could see this being ideal for those carrying some extracurricular items they don’t want found or exposed.. not suggesting- Just saying!! Overall, I’m so impressed for a price point of $12 these are a great solution made solid. Hoping info can help make your decision- stay safe everyone!', 'reviewer': 'The Girl Utah', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-02'}, {'header': 'More comfortable than some name brands...', 'body': 'Soft and smooth. The length is just right. Others have been too long going past the bottom of my shorts. As you can see in the picture you can see how close to knee it goes. 5\'8" with 34" inseam in case you wondering. On one leg you see how long shorts are and the other how long these compression shorts are.They zipper pockets are on each hip front side of body. You can put key fob, ID, credit card or gym card and not worry about losing it. I\'d suggest maybe a plastic bag for your key fob to keep sweat from seeping into touch pads. Yeah gross, but that is number one killer of key fobs, well that and putting it thru the washing machine. Just my opinion. I believe YouTube has a video on how to clean your key fob.I had my brother model them and well, I think that is the only real shot Amazon will allow. They feel like underwear but if you are comfortable and have the body for it, you can wear it like you would bicycle shorts in public.I don\'t feel comfortable wearing them in public. That is just me.What I do like about these? If you are traveling in foreign countries you can wear these under your regular pants/shorts and use the zipper pockets to "Hide" some valuables. Would prevent being pick pocketed. My friends sister wanted these for their trip to Europe but they were too big for them.For now, I think my brother will be using these. He goes to the gym and runs often. Said these are perfect for that. He\'s a bit younger than I am and has the confidence to wear these out in public. Not me so much! LOL.BUT THEY ARE SUPER COMFORTABLE! If they could only compress my gut a bit too.So if you are fit and active these are great. If you are not fit and active these are still great just wear them under your regular shorts.These are COMPRESSION shorts so they do their job. I guess these could be like the male version of Spanx. Keeps you looking super fit under your clothes. I really like that part of these!Enjoy', 'reviewer': 'B. Coyote', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-01'}, {'header': 'Comfortable Compression Shorts', 'body': 'They were a bit tighter than was expecting, but will probably loosen after a couple of times wearing them. I like that it has two side pockets with zippers, perfect for storing ID, credit card or phone.', 'reviewer': 'gocubbies1984', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-24'}, {'header': 'Great Compression Shorts!', 'body': 'Shortstop and great. They are great addition to my work out wardrobe. I normally wear a 32 inch waist, weighing in adjust over 190 muscular pounds. The medium fit very well and comfortably.They work great for running and lifting. If you are bored enough, they work as a standalone pair of shorts for those longer runs. In the separate pocket is idealy sized for holding a phone. They are also a comfortably short enough length to wear underneath a regular pair of gym shorts, without obstructing the full range of motion. Ideal for squatty or dead lifting.They fit incredibly comfortably and are very soft to the touch, or providing the right amount of support and compression were needed, and are not too revealing in areas where you can imagine. The solid black and camouflage pattern are also Craig, subtle ways to match nearly any outfit.', 'reviewer': 'JM', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-05'}, {'header': 'Excellent', 'body': "These shorts are very comfortable and don't chafe or sweat. The pockets are deep and don't feel uncomfortable to put items in them. Can even fit large phones. Very stretchy and smooth feeling. Can be worn as regular shorts and are even comfortable enough to be worn as underwear or under other shorts.", 'reviewer': 'Dorian', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-16'}, {'header': 'Compression shorts', 'body': 'I love the long type of compression shorts because I wear the 5 inch seam shorts and putting these compression shorts under pairs up well feels like as if I’m not wearing nothing, so fresh and cool especially when it’s hot outside it won’t get all wet I’m already planning on buying more of these pairs I recommend them true to size', 'reviewer': 'bernadette', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-01'}, {'header': 'fit great, comfortable, love the pockets', 'body': 'Fit as expected, not too tight, comfortable, and has plenty of pockets! Nice pants', 'reviewer': 'Micheal', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-24'}, {'header': 'Pain and Strain Begone!', 'body': "The Anawakia compression shorts provide the support I need for doing yard work and exercising. I've been wearing a pair the last couple of days. They keep my groin from straining when I use my chain saw or pole saw. The shorts keep the muscles from straining and reduce pain. They also dry fast. I feel more confident with them holding everything in place. They are a great reminder not to get too carried away when I lift logs or rocks and do other farm work. Plus, they have pockets for my phone, keys, or whatever. When I run, they make me feel protected and more confident. Great shorts, great buy!", 'reviewer': 'L.W. Samuelson', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-06-03'}, {'header': 'Love these!', 'body': "These are fantastic compression shorts. The material is thin enough to not run hot but also not too thin. They are comfortable and provide just the right amount of compression without being too tight.But what I really love about these are the pockets. Yes I said POCKETS. And the pockets are snug so they will not flop around while you are working out, like some others do. The pockets are also generous enough to fit the largest cellphones made. Awesome!There honestly isn't anything not to like about these and at $17 they are a good value in my opinion. description: Here       With ultra high strength fabric, your Icon Fight Shorts are virtually indestructible. In fact, theyre so strong they can withstand over 790 newtons of force in laboratory tensile strength testing. Rest assured, these shorts are built to last. Extended, pro fighter side slits are the pinnacle feature of the Icon Fight Shorts. The longer length delivers an expanded range of motion for the highest kicks and completely unrestricted flow for grappling. Our most secure shorts, with interlocking closure, a single-loop drawstring, and a silicone waistband to keep your shorts locked in place no matter how hard you train. Read more Read more SPECIFICATIONS Materials: Exterior: 100% high tensile strength polyester. Inseam: 88% polyester, 12% elastane Waistband: Silicone lined hem Drawstring: Single loop Stitching: Reinforced stitching Best for: MMA, Muay Thai, Kickboxing, Grappling, Boxing Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low.

description: Jab, cross, hook, cross! Get ready to feel a punch of adrenaline when you slip on these Everlast Elite Pro Style Training Boxing Gloves. These synthetic leather, pro-style gloves are ready for optimum training for heavy bag workouts, mitt work, and sparring. The hourglass shape conforms to the natural shape of your fist, these gloves help promote proper techniques for punching before you hit the ring for your first match. Evershield padding also provides intense shock absorbency with full padding on the front, back, and wrist to keep your safety top-of-mind when you're dodging all the uppercuts, side punches, and left hooks. These included Everlast hand wraps (3 pack) are made of a durable, polyester-cotton blend and help ensure breathability. The wraps are ideal for boxing or MMA training on the speed bag, heavy bag, or even sparring. The wraps feature a handy thumb strap and a hook-and-loop closure system, which ensures a snug fit each time you put them on.
features: Elite Pro Gloves - Black 8 ounce Everlast Elite Pro style training boxing gloves ideal for sparring, heavy bag workouts, and mitt work$$$Secure & Comfortable - Hourglass-shaped wrist with Evershield reinforced padding stabilizes your hand and wrist, providing a supportive, comfortable, and truly secure fit$$$Pro Quality - Premium synthetic leather along with superior construction increases durability with Evercool full mesh palm ensures breathability and comfort$$$Glove Features - Built with closed cell foam technology for hand protection and grip cord for extra gripping power$$$Includes - Durable, polyester-cotton Everlast 120-Inch red, black, and white boxing hand wraps which provide breathability and safety during training or sparring sessions ideal for boxing or MMA training

features: 100% Performance Poly-Spandex$$$Drawstring closure$$$THE BACKSTORY. We launched Anthem Athletics in 2015. Our first product went on to become the #1 bestselling rashguard in its category. Since then, weve created some of the top-selling and highest rated gear for cross-training and combat sports on Amazon.com. But by 2020, customer demand for our cross-training and workout gear had skyrocketed while global supply chain shocks challenged our ability to keep products in stock. We made the tough choice to delay our new fight gear line. Until now.$$$RECREATE. REIMAGINE. REIGNITE. We reimagined our combat sports line from the ground up. New fabrics, new colors, and new patterns. Same great performance, quality and clean, performance-oriented look that has put a smile on fighters and athletes across the globe.$$$KEY FEATURES. Handcrafted from a strong and light performance fabric with high-impact, ultra-durable flatlock stitching. Fully-sublimated logos and graphics that will never crack or peel. Internal drawstring and elastic waistband for maximum comfort and security. Aggressive side slits for maximum mobility. Optimized for MMA, BJJ, grappling, no-gi training. Competition approved models. Modern, athletic fit. American sizing. Designed in the USA. Buy with confidence.$$$UNRIVALED PRICE TO VALUE. We'll never be the cheapest option on the market, but you get what you pay for. Our products feature an unrivaled combination of style, quality, fit and performance - all at a reasonable price.$$$WANT THE RIGHT FIT? Follow our product specific sizing chart (last product image) for product sizing and fit guidance. 5" inseam typically falls 4-5" above the knee. 7" inseam 1-2" above the knee. 9" inseam at the knee. Still have questions? Don't hesitate to shoot us a message, and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

other_category: Men's Athletic Shorts #16,397 in Running Clothing
description: The BOA 1 Stretch Elite Short features our new Hybrid Lite stretch fabric, our most comfortable fabric to date. This fabric incorporates spandex allowing for 4-way stretch to eliminate all bind and creates an ultra-soft feel. 1 inseam and high side splits offer complete range of motion, and minimalistic coverage for the elite runner. Elastic waistband and draw cord provide adjustability for your perfect fit. Sleek internal key pocket built into waistband. If performance is on your mind, look no further. Shell Hybrid Lite, 88/12 Micro Polyester/Spandex, Lining 100% Polyester Ultra-Lightweight stretch fabric provides extra soft flexible performance while keeping you dry during your runs. Full side split for complete freedom and range of motion. 1 inseam Moisture Wicking and Quick Drying Elastic waistband with built in drawstring and key pocket Designed, Cut, Sewn, and Printed in the USA COUNTRY OF ORIGIN: United States FABRIC CONTENT: Shell Hybrid Lite, 88/12 Micro Polyester/Spandex, Lining 100% Polyester
features: Crepe,Polyester,Spandex$$$Drawstring closure$$$Hybrid Lite, 88/12 Micro Polyester/Spandex$$$Polyester Crepe Brief$$$Elite Split Leg Cut$$$Inside Drawstring$$$Key Pocket at Inside Waist

', 'num_of_votes': 4, 'num_of_answers': 5, 'answered_by': 'stephano salinas'}, {'body': 'do these shorts have an inner lining?', 'answer': 'I bought 2 pairs of these exact shorts same link 1 year ago (2020) and they both had lining (separate purchases). I just bought another pair (July 2021) and no lining. I will be returning the most recent pair. ', 'num_of_votes': 3, 'num_of_answers': 10, 'answered_by': 'juniorj'}, {'body': 'Do these have a liner?', 'answer': 'yes it has a mesh liner. even with the liner you still want to wear something underneath as they are still a bit see through. ', 'num_of_votes': 1, 'num_of_answers': 6, 'answered_by': 'bnb'}, {'body': 'Where does the waistband of these shorts contact the body? Above the belly button (high waisted) or below the belly button (low waisted)?', 'answer': "     You select the location. It's only partly decided by your belly button. It's where you want the legs to hit your thigh or knee. Personally, I wear them just below my belly button and they hit slightly below my knees. If I pulled them high above my belly button they'd be at my thighs, but I don't like that look. I imagine relative locations depend on how tall you are. I'm 5'10'. reviews: [{'header': 'GREAT SHORTS/GREAT SERVICE/GREAT FIGHT', 'body': 'Brought them for my neighbor who is like a son to me, he needed them ASAP. He was fighting for a Olympic position and originally scheduled to fight in the blue corner which we were prepared for. The day before the fight, he received a call that he would be fighting in the red corner. No where within a 2-3 hour drive had these shorts available in his size. Thank God for prime and using UPS. UPS had them on a truck at 3:40am day of the fight and I needed them by 11am. UPS.Com chat session said there was nothing that could be done. I called our local UPS office and explained to them the emergency, they located the truck at a WAWA nearby my home and had the driver meet me at a location close to where the fight was being held. All worked out great....although my son fought a giant who had 8" in height and a long reach, he hung in there, a good fight, a spilt decision gave the fight to the blue corner!', 'reviewer': 'Trixcy31', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2015-09-14'}, {'header': 'Great buy', 'body': 'I like how it fit as expected and being that it is from Title I expected quality and was not disappointed.', 'reviewer': 'Garnet Back Together', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-08-06'}, {'header': 'the product is what they say it is ...very honest !!!', 'body': 'This was a great gift for my son he loves them ..so comfortable,good material,size is perfect, the seller was very helpful..will be making future purchases...thank u again !!!!😃', 'reviewer': 'DevintheDude', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2021-02-15'}, {'header': 'Worried about the sizing', 'body': 'I was really worried about the size as I had no idea what to expect. I got an XL and im 106cm on the waist. It was a good fit - but the white section was very flexible so could have fit perfectly for a smaller size.I honestly loved these pants - they are proper boxing shorts but also at a good price - I had it as a costume.The only thing I didnt like was the delivery price - it was worth it though as it was the best boxing outfit I could find and it did get here on the day it said it would (day before the party so that was awesome).', 'reviewer': 'Bec992', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2013-10-24'}, {'header': 'Nice Trunks', 'body': 'Nice Trunks to of course box in. Plenty of room in the critical areas for a crotch protection and all. Waist holds its location, and never sags. Easy to wash, wash cold, hang dry. You could use these for boxing workouts. Though you might want to pick above the knee kinds probably be more comfortable. These compare with my Ringside and Everlast trunks I have too.Construction is excellent. Good seams, and sewn straight, no dangling threads, nice gathers and strong elastic waist band. Nice shiny silky poly fabric for that classy look. Cut very comfortable for loose fit.I would look at the stock trunks as they could be a better value overall, but these trunks are well done and a keeper for my workouts and whatever.', 'reviewer': 'VINCENT CHEN', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2011-09-14'}, {'header': 'My boyfriend loved them. I am curvy but probably not as curvy as the average woman, so that may be why it’s big for me but the right size for others. If you are on the more curvier side, a small should fit you fine.
