reviews: [{'header': 'Comfy, practical, cute', 'body': 'A friend was wearing these one day and I thought they were super cute so I of course asked where she got them. Amazon it is, so here I am considering buying another pair because I honestly really like them. I am active and it’s extremely hot where I live in the summer. These have been perfect for daily everything, yoga, exercising, gardening, you name it. The pockets are great, totally functional. I like that these are fitted enough to not gap and show anything I don’t want seen, yet loose enough to not have that “spandex fit”… I’m a yoga instructor and hate “yoga shorts” … literally they just ride up and are incredibly inconvenient and uncomfortable…so I wanted to try these instead and so far am not disappointed. No riding up, no wedgy, no sticking to skin, or showing my butt cheeks…For reference I’m 5’3 and 113 pounds and bought a small. I probably could fit an XS too, but would rather keep the fit of the small.', 'reviewer': 'SarahL', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-08'}, {'header': 'Love these shorts!', 'body': 'I am 5’5”, 144 lbs. 30” waist, 40” hips. I have saddle bags. Yee haw! 🙄 Anyway, I’ve always wanted to wear cute/sexy shorts, but my thighs were like, “Nope!” These shorts, though, they say, “YES!” The length is really nice. Perfect, in fact. The bottom of the shorts stop at about the top of mid-thigh (a.k.a. Bottom of saddle bags). While everything isn’t perfectly hidden, most is. I’m happy with the fit. They do that little curvy thing on the sides so they’re not straight all the way around, so they look stylish, if that makes sense. I also wanted to point out how surprisingly SOFT the fabric is for pretty inexpensive shorts. I bought FOUR pairs, and I want more. I have been wanting shorts like these my whole life. You’re wondering what size I ordered, right? I have one pair in the medium, which fit nicely, but I prefer the large for the length. There is a tie string at the waist that saves the day and makes the larger size fit as it should. You will want every color!', 'reviewer': 'Paige L.', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-25'}, {'header': 'I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE!!', 'body': 'I was looking for shorts that where short but not to the point my hut cheeks fell out...these have such a nice fit and for hoe short I am longer shorts look weird. These fit so well I ordered 1 then 2 more!!! I didn\'t get the pockets because they where cheaper but I will order many of these again!!! I am 5\'2" and around 125 lbs and got an extra small...they are a little tight but nothing that would be bothersome!!! If your nor sure order them...I have thicker thighs and these look so flattering!!!', 'reviewer': 'Cheykitten93', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-19'}, {'header': 'Fav shorts', 'body': 'My new favorite shorts! They’re great to go out in and lounge around the house in. They’re really flattering and the dry-wicking fabric keeps you cool in the heat. I have 3 pairs and I love them. They are true to size but not a lot of stretch so if you like your shorts a little less fitted I would go up a size. I’m 5’3 about 150 and I love how medium fits.', 'reviewer': 'Destini', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-28'}, {'header': 'Great quality and cheap!', 'body': "I will be buying many more pairs to get me through my pregnancy! I decided instead of buying designated maternity clothes, I would just go through the rest of my pregnancy in athleisure. These shorts are super comfy and I don't have to keep pulling them down when I get up from the seated position. As someone with thick thighs, I did not want to deal with that any more. I'm 140-145lbs and usually wear a size 4/6 and a medium fits me perfectly with enough stretch that I'm confident they'll still fit me perfectly as I get bigger. Definitely worth it for the price.", 'reviewer': 'Brittny', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-13'}, {'header': 'So comfy and flattering', 'body': "I put these on the second they were delivered. Hey....im a casual chick. :)", 'reviewer': 'elainabobana', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-16'}, {'header': 'Comfortable good quality', 'body': 'I’ve worn these , washed them so many times already , I air dry so they won’t string on me. I absolutely love these such a good buy I wanted comfy shorts for around the house and these are it. Can definitely work out in them as well I’m not too athletic. Would buy again', 'reviewer': 'Lisabel', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-08-24'}, {'header': 'Love! Anytime Shorts.', 'body': 'Great to workout in them but I bought lounge around. Love the feel of the material, they do no shrink, colors do not fade, throw on a nice tee shirt and sandals, a comfy day on vacation. They are flattering, my husband loves them also, which I’d why I came back and bought another pair. Love the fact you can still look good in a pair of shorts even if you don’t use them at the gym.Worth every dollar, a great find.A plus recommendedOh fits as describe. I am 5’6 135 a Medium a comfy perfect fit even after washing & dryer.', 'reviewer': 'Rhonda', 'purchase_type': 'Verified Purchase', 'reviewer_rating': 5.0, 'reviewer_location': 'the United States', 'review_date': '2022-07-31'}, {'header': 'So comfortable and flattering!', 'body': 'These shorts are exactly what I was looking for for summer. The material is too heavy for running and they are too short for lifting, in my opinion. But that’s not what I bought them for. I bought them for throwing on in the summer and going about my day. I started with one pair, am up to 4 and will probably still buy more colors since they are inexpensive and I love them so much.Fit: the waist is on the looser side, which I love. You can tighten it with the drawstring, but it’s to have shorts that lay nicely at the waist without pinching or creating a roll. The legs cut up a little on the side in a way that is flattering to your legs and backside. I am 5’5 120 lbs and ordered a small.Color: I included pictures of two colors that were different from what I expected. In my opinion the black is more of a charcoal or heather black. That is what it looks like in the product picture and that is what I wanted, but I wanted to warn anyone who was hoping for true black. These are not. description: Make relaxing a priority with the Simone short, an easygoing staple with elevated seaming and doubled layered fabric. Its great to pair it with a tank or a sports-bra. Size chart available on our Amazon Brand Page.  Colosseum DESIGNED FOR MOTION Previous page  OUR STORY  What we wear should move between all of lifes activities. Every article we make is designed for motion. We know the right wardrobe can inspire confidence! Persistence can help you achieve. Challenges will help you enact change. Consistency will help you maintain. Positive mindset unleashes your potential. Conquer it all in Colosseum. At Colosseum, we realize our sourcing decisions have a social impact in factories and communities around the globe. To this end, we are committed to improving the well-being of, and the working conditions for, thousands of workers wherever Colosseum products are made, seeking out sustainable materials and processes, and supporting local communities. description: Officially Licensed LIFEGUARD Brand Our story Over 50 years ago, our products became being recognized by many around the shores. Making clothing and accessories of all kinds, with quality in mind, our product were demanded and we kept responding. It is because of our loyal customers that brought us where we are. Our brand is trademarked and recognized by many across the nation. LIFEGUARD is an iconic beachwear lifestyle brand related to fun times and happy days. We love to be of help to others and love to make clothing. We see how much you enjoy our products and we continue on our journey to make more items catered to your liking.

reviews: [{'header': 'Super Comfortable Mid-Rise Waist', 'body': 'When these arrived and I tried them on, they felt great right away. I left them on the rest of the day! They\'re well made, lightweight, and flattering. They fit like a second skin. On brisk walks (I\'m not a jogger), I noticed that they "hold me in" without being too tight or constricting, and made my movement feel more efficient. Truly a pleasure to wear, when working out or to run errands. I\'ll probably order a second identical pair - one to wear, one to wash. I\'m 5\'7" and 160 lbs, and the Large fits just right.
